Jaqi janchi:
Jaqi janchi, jaqi janchinakan sutinakapax akïrinakawa:p'iqi, kunka, kallachi, ampara, nasa, nayra, jinchu, ispillu, puraka, kururu, chara, qunquri, kayu, jikhani, ch'illa, mujlli, luk'ana.

LIQI LIQI K´AWNA:
LIQI LIQI: Mä uyma jamach´iwa thaya pata pampanakana jakasiriwa, samipaxa qaqa janq´u, p´iqipaxa t´alpha, kanunakapaxa chupika wali q´uñu q´uñu jalnaqt´asiri, kunapachatixa jaqix jutki ukapachaxa wir wir sasawa uksa aksa muyupayi.
Aka liqi liqix qalltiwa k´awnaña sata phaxi qallta urunaka, k´awnapaxa pusiwa; aka liqi liqi k´awnaxa tayiyiwa pacha sarawinaka yapu yapuchiri jilanakaru, kunapachatix liqi liqix k´awni quntu patanakaruxa yatiyiwa wali jallu marañatakiwa, ukatx kunapachatix suka jawiranakaru k´awni ukkhaxa waña marañatakiwa.
Ukhamarakiwa tapachapaxa yatiyistuwa ,unapachatixa walja qalanakanixa ukkhanaxa chhijchhiwa wali purispa, iwija thajatixa utjaspaxa wali ch´uqi, ch'uñu marañatakiwa, ch´illiwa,siwara lastuja utski ukkhaxa wali siwara, jupha jawasa achunakawa achuspa. 
Kunapachatix k´awnapax suma chuxñakixa , jacha chiyara chimpunakanikixa ukkhaxa suma juyra marañatakiwa, ukhanaraki qaqa ch´uxña , chiyara chimpunakapaxa wali t´unaki ukkhaxa yatiyarakiwa macha mara.

Q'urawanaka:
Q'uranakax paris q'urawäki ukawa. 
Nayrapacha.
Jäya pachanakanx q’urawanak satakix ukanak apnaqapxäna. Nayrapachanakax janiw makinanakax apnaqatakänti. Nayra pachanx jupanakakiw kunanaks lurasipxäna: isinaka, phukunaka, taqi yäninaka, utanakapan apnaqañataki. Warminakaw lurapxäna aksti uywanakatak irnaqapxänwa.
K’anaña.
Aka lurañatakixa nayrakatax uywanakat t’arwaw yawirapxäna iwijatsa qarwatsa ukatxa t’axsusina, wañarayasin warminakaw qapupxi. Nayrapachanx warminakax tawaqitat pachaw sum qapuñx yatipxäna, akasti kunatix awichanak taykanakampiw jisk’a imill wawanakaruw yatichapxäna nayrax sapxänwa, mä warmix qapuñx sum yatiñapa jan yatirirux jayra warm sutichapxäna. Ukat t’arwa qapusisaxä amparampiw k’anapxirinä sum pach apsupxäna pä tamit qimsa tamits luraratarakiw.
Apnaqaña.
Q’urawx uywanak awatiñatakiw iqnaqapxi, kunatix jaya pampa tuqinakaruw anakipxirïna uka jaya panpanakanj utjanwa tiwulanaka pampa anu, uywa awatirinakax q’urawampiw mä qalampis khulampis uka anunakarux wakt’ayapxi. Kunatix q’urawax armawa, castill arunxa. Sistanxa ukhamawa jaypacharuw qalanaks khulanaks sarayi, ukatwa uka irnakapxäna wali askinwa uywanak awatiñataki.
Jicha pachanx janiw anch irnaqapxiti kunatix marka tuqirukiw sarxapxi jan ukax janiw jaya pampanakarux sarxapxiti kunatix uywanakatak manq’anakap alapxakiw, ukatwa utanakapan jak’akiw uymanak chinsusin pashpar manq’ churapxi, ukatwa mäuk’a armataxi aka q’urawa.

Jisk'a anata:
Jisk'a anatan jisk'a wawanax cunaiman ist'apita walikusisiñan wawanaka wali anatapxi umampi. 

Ch'illkha:
Ch'illkhax mä qulla aliwa. Ayllunakanx wali aski qullapunitaynawa.
Nayrapacha.
Nayrapachanakatpachsa, achachilanak awichanakax ch'illkxa, wali sum uywasipxiritayna. Kunawsatix mayni jilas kullakas ampars kays p'akjasixa, ch'illkhampiw ch'axsusin qullxatasipxiritayna. Uywanakarus ukapachparakikiw qullapxiritayna. 
Jichhapacha.
Jichhürunakans chhillkhax uywasitakiskiwa, juk'ampis qhirwa uraqin ukhamarak suni uraqin wali sum achunti. 
Kunjam qullasiñasa.
Ch'illkhax wali sum ch'axsuña. Yaqha alinakamp kunaw wali sum piqsuña.

Altu jach'a marka:
Alto jach'a markax wali qamasan aymar markawa.

Aymar arsunaka:
Aymar arsunakax aymara arut qillqañatakiwa. Latin qillqarjam luratarakiwa.

Allpi:
Allpi manq'ax patanakan phayapxi, 
Phayaña.
jichhürunakax aka "La Paz" markan phayapxarakiwa. Aka allpix taqi kast waña juyranakat wakiyapxi. 
Kunjam wakichañasa.
ukhamaraki taqi kast phukunakan phayapxi. Allpix wali askiwa taqi jaqinakataki ukhamaraki thayjatatatäkiwa. 
Aka manq´ax tunqut, waña ch'uñut phayaxpharakiwa. Ukhamaraki aka allpix wali achhij liwapxi ukhatsti phusart'añawa. Allpi manq'am janch junt'uptayaraki. Jichha pachanx allpi manq'ax kunayman kast kast wakiyapxi, ukhamaraki maynitjamaw sinti jayump, wayk'amp uchantasiña.

Isla del Sol marka:
Isla Del Sol Markax Titiqaqa (kastilla aru: Lago Titicaca) uka quta taypinkiwa, khuri “provincia Manco Kapac” ukana. Aka markax sayt'urux 9.6 kilumitru ukhamarak irwaqarux 4.8 kilumitru ukhanirakiwa, ukhamarak yaqhipax sapxiwa: aka markax qullänawa (kastilla aru: sagrado).
Nayrapacha.
Nayra pachax Wiraquchax inkanacan jiliripax tatitupanwa, aka wiraquchax pä wawanak uchatayna, “Manqu Kapaqump Mama Uxllumpi” ukanakaw wali sum jakasiripxatayna. Uka Isla del Sol markana, ukat uka pa jaqix yakha uraqinakaw thakhapxana, sullat xuqu uraqinak minapxirinwa. Ukat jaya "CUSCO PERU" markaruw jaqkir sarapxatayna.
Ayllunakapa.
Wat’a markax pä aylluniwa, jach’a ukax Yumani satawa, yaqhasti Ch’alla Pampa satarakiwa. Paypachan uta inkanakaw utji 
Uñch'ukiñawja.
Yumaniruw quta lakar purisin mä jach’a patillat uñchukiñawa, uk mistuñawa, ukat alayaruw purisin kimsa um chhixiskir uñjasi, (kastilla aru: fuente del inca) uk inkanakaw munasiñapamp uñstayapxatayna, uka umax Piru markat juti sapxiwa.
Puriñataki.
“Copacaban” markata mä lanchat islakam sarañaxa pä pachat kimsatunka q’atampi purintata. Quta lakar, Yumani markaruw puriyasipxi ukan jaqinakapax wali sum katuqasipxi. 
Ukat juk’am alayarux walja utanakaw uñstani, uka utanakax jakkirinakanx qalanakamp jichhump ñiq'imp luratawa ukan utjix manq’a, ikiñ utanaka, jaqinakax wali sum katuqapxi yakha jaya jach’a markanakat jutirinakarux.
Ayllunkirinaka.
Isla markan jakkir jaqinakax yapu lurasipxi ukhamarak challwa katusipxi ukampi jakasipxi, taqikasta yapunak utji jawasa, ch’uq apilla, alwirja, tawri, yakhanakampi. 
Jaya markanakat jaqinakaw inkan sarnakawipa uñjir jutapxi
Jiwakiw taqi kuns uñjañatak utji
Qala utanak 
Sutipax chinkana

El Greco:
Doménikos Theotokópoulos grisya aru: Δομήνικος Θεοτοκόπουλος suti jaqi, El Greco (* Candia, 1541 mara yuritayna - Mougins, 1614 mara 8 uru Yapu apthapi phaxsin yuriwi) Grisya jach'a marka llimphiri yäpari.
Awki: Geórgios Theotokópoulos; Tayka: . 

Janq'u Uta:

Phisqhïr Jach'a Thakhi:
Phisqhïr Jach'a Thakhix  mä jach'a thakhiwa, uka  borough  Manhattan ukhat  New York Jach'a Markan, Istarus Unirun qallti. Ukhamarak aka thakhix West 143rd Street  Harlem ukan  Washington Square North ukhakamawa Washington Square Park ukhatsti Greenwich Village. Aka Jach'a Thakhix taqikunapuniw aljañatakix walja chaninitapat uñt'atawa.

Lady Gaga:
Stefani Joanne Angelina Germanotta (/ˈstɛfəniː dʒɜːrməˈnɒtə/ "STEF-ə-nee" "jur-mə-NOT-ə"; New York. 28 uru Achuqa phaxsinta, 1986 marana yuritayna), Lady Gaga ukham uñt'ata, 
USAna jaylliri.
Sarnaqäwipa.
Lady Gagan janïr nayrïr tama waruqawinakap purinyankasax khä pä waranq kimsaqallkun maranxa (2008), mä jan uñt’at jayllir ukhamarak qillqir pä tunk payan maraninwa. Uka "fame" sat sutin tama waruqanakapax, mä kimsa jach’a suma k’uchirt'äwinaka, phisqha sutiñchawinakamp "Gramy" ukar apanitayna. Ukatx mä akatjamat wali uñt’ataxi Lady Gagan sata. Walja jaqinakaw sustjasipxäna jan isisiñ isimp isisitapata (kawknïr isinakattix isiskanax jupapachpan luratataynawa), mayjanak sanusitapat ukhamarak wali sustjaskañ uñacht’awinakamp (jupax ukarux sutiyiwa “mä jach’a phuñchhawi”). Arkirinakapax wali ukham k’uchirawipampix jupampipxi.

Felipe Quispe:
Felipe Quispe Huanca (Chuqiyapu, 1942 maran yuritayna - Altu pata, 2021 maran chhaqhawayxi), Mallku jilatax mayni aymar markan amawt'anawa, p'iqiñchiripawa. Khaysa Jach'aq'achi (Achacachi) markan yuritayna. Felipe Qhisphi Wankax Mallku sutimp uñt'atanawa. Aka amawt'a irpirix q'aranakar walpun saykatawayi, janiw aliqak isch'ukiwaykiti, jan ukasti amuympi, amtanakampiw sayt'asiwayi.
Ukhamipanwa, khaya 2000 maranx CSUTCB (Confederación Sindical Única de Trabajadores y Campesinos de Bolivia)p'iqiñchirikasinx q'ara jaqinakaruw walpun aymar markamp chiqt'at saykatawayata. Ukhat machaq amuyunakax aka Wuliwya markanx k'amphikiptaniñ qalltaniwayi.
Jakäwipa.
Jisk'atpach pata pampanakan yapump uywampiw tatanakapamp chikt'at jilsuniwayatayna. Iskuylanx yatichirinakapatx jisk'achäwinak katuqiritayna. Ukhatpachwa, amuyupanx kunats akhama, sasin amuytatañ qallantaniwayatayna. 
Wat'añ utar mantatapa.
Wat'añ utarux EGTK uka mayacht'äwin chikañchasitapat khakhantapxatayna. 

Waman Puma:
Waman Puma ( (* San Cristóbal de Suntuntu, Ayaquchu, 1534 mara yuritayna - Lima, 1615 mara yuriwi) jacha marka qillqiri.
Awki: Martín Guaman Mallqui; Tayka: Juana Chuquitanta (Cusi Ocllo).

Juan Mora:
Juan Rafael Mora Porras (* San Jusiy marka,1814 mara 8 uru Anata phaxsin yuritayna - Puntarenas marka, 1860 mara 30 uru Llamp'u phaxsin yuriwi). jacha marka anakithiri.
Kustarikapa Prisidinti (1849 - 1860).
Awki: Camilo Mora Alvarado; Tayka: Ana Benita Porras Ulloa<br>Warmi: Inés Aguilar Cueto<br>Yuqanaka: Elena, Teresa, Alberto, Amelia, Juan de Dios, Camilo, Juana Mora Aguilar & Antonio Mora Aguilar.
Yachaywasi: 
Alma mater: .

El Dorado Chhaqhayatak jach'a markawa:
El Dorado Chhaqhayatak jach'a markawa, anqaxankir ispañul jaqinakax, aka Qullasuyu markasarux purinipxatayna, mä chiqarux kawkhantix quri, qullqi utjkana ukharuwa Dorada sutimpi sutiyapxatayna, kunatix uka uraqin jakir jaqinakax "cultura" Chipcha jaqinakaw uka chiqan qamapxäna Colombia Bogotá jak’ana.
Uka chiqanx jaqir jaqinakax wali qamiripxanawa sapxarakiwa, kunapachatix phuñchhawinakanxa jaqinaka quri… la janchinakaparuw uskusipxirina, ukax jupanakatakix wali askipuninawa imperio patakixa, ukhamarakiw markanakapax wali suma quri k’ajkirikirakinawa leyenda mano jan ukhasti Omowa satarakinwa.
Uka yanakapax uñjasax wali puniwa español jaqinakax,walpuniw qullqinakapx churantapxana quri apsuñataki.
Ukat walja jaqinakawa quri apsuñatak sarapxana, ukat yaqhip qhuya minakar irnaqir jaqinakax kunayman jan wali usunakaniw jakawinakaparax kutt'axapxarakinja.
Kunatix wali uñt'at españoll jaqix Francisco Orellana, jupax waranqa phisqa pataka pusitunka uka maranakanxa Amazona ukat juk'ampinaka markanakaruw purinuqanxa jan yänak jiqxatasa, uka markanakan sarnaqana, inamayakiw juk'ampi markanakanthaqarakina, uka lurawinakax wali pankanakan qillqatarakiwa, ukhamaraki waruqatarakiwa jach'añchu untañanakana uk lurawinakax Ramón José, jupan qillt'atatakiwa Dorado sutin apst'araki waranqa llätunka suxta tunka kimsaqallqu tunka marana.

¿KUNATS UTJPACH JUK´ JARIYAÑ NAYRAQAT WAWANAKAR YATIQAÑ UTANAKAN SARAÑATAKI AKA T´AQ ARUN AMUYUNJA?:
JUK´A ARUNAK (Resumen) 
Aka, qamawisanx wali atipasiñanakan qamsnax sapur kamaw jankiw nayrst´away kunanakasa. Ukalaykutaw wawanakarus mayipxix isq´atpachanakat yatiqañpawa, kunatix aka, wawanakarux sum wakichayañawa ukataw kawkins sumaw sarani, khitirux atipaskakispawa, kawkirus puriskakispawa.
Yariyañ nayraqatasti, sañ muniw mä tama lurawinaka, kunatix akampix lursnaw apsusnaw walj musallanak janchisata, amuyunakasata, amuy marakachirinakat wawanakanxa, jayriyañtuqit waljakinak luraskakiñaw chiqanchañataki. 
QANANCHAÑA (INTRODUCCIÓN)
Nayra pachanakat jaqinakarust yatiyapxinwa, akasti, uñjañatakinwa, kunanakas yatipxana, kunankas luriripxana, taqi, ukanakaw umuyupxanaw jaqinakata. Aka, yatiqawinakax luarasinw sum wawanakax sarañpatakiw ukat nayraqaturx sapxanwa yämakis isk´a asukutpachaw lurañaw sum qhananchañatak wawanakan jakawinakapaxa.
Yatiq lurawist apasiñapaw taqi, k´achatakipuniwa, janiw nayrachañakit yatiqawinx wawanakarux ansas yanapt´añaw maraparjam janirakiw yaqha yatiqañanak jiljamaranakat yatichañakiti, sarañapakix ukakiw yatichaña, taqinis ukhamatarakiw jikirsnaw yatiqawi.
Ukasti, sum amuyuñarakiw janiw wawankax kipqapurapkiti, ansas sapamayniw mayjatarakiw qatuqapxi yatiqañanaka, ukhamarus aruskasiwins pachparakiwa. Tayk awkist yatipxañpaw kawkikamas sum jayriyañapuw janiw anch walj jayriyäñakiti.
Tayk awkinakasti, sumpuniw amuyupxañapuniw kunatix jayriyañ uqsatuqita, yänapañapunirakiw yämakis churañaw wallj iyawsawinaka, ch´amanchawinaka. Ukataw sañ utanapuniw qalltañ sum jayriyan wawanakasarux suma yatiñchawinakampinakax yatichaña. 
Ukampinsa, jayriyañ nayaraqat sarawisti, janirakiw uñt´atakitix tayk awkinakampix uka suma lurawinakax qamañapan ukhanakana, wawanakarust tayk awkist jupanakankiw yanapt´añanakasti. May t´aqanakast uñjasiw jayriyañanxa, wawanakast sarapkix yatiqañ utarux ukanaw qalltix jakawipax wawanakana.
Yatiqañ utanax uñjasiw taqi yatiqawinakapa, taqi lurawinakapa, taqi musallanakapa, taqi sumankañanakap mitapampinaka, taqi arunakapata. Tayk awkinakast sum yanapt´axist wawanakarux jayriyawinsti, wawanakax sum yanapatanakast janiw jan walt´awinakapax utjkanit yatqañ utana. Yamakis yatichirinakarus inamp jasakiniw yatichasti uka wawanarux sum jayriyätanakata. 
Ukataw altu pata markan lurasiwayix aka yatxatawisti, aski, amuyuñapuniw wawanakasarux sum jayriyañax nayraqata, akasti, qipanakarust jan utjañpatak uka, jan walt´awinakast yatiqañ utana. Uñjtanwa walaj jan walt´awinkax tayk awkinkan kunat jan yanapt´añ atkapkisti, may jan walt´awinakapast qullqimpiwa, mayasti, jaqinakan amuyunapampiwa, mayasti jaqinakan lurawinakapampiwa, uñjañapawa. 
QHANANCHSUÑA (DESARROLLO)
JARIYAÑ NAYRAQATA (LA ESTIMULACIÓN TEMPRANA)
Akasti, jariyañ nayraqat sañ muniw kunayman qutunakawa, lurawinak thakhi, lurañ yatqxtawik apasiw saparsa, irnaqasiñapaw wawanakanx yuritapat suxta marankamaw kunkimp wal yatiq lurañpataki, akasti, lurataw tatanakaru, mamanakaru, yanapt´añataki, wawanak sum yatiqañatuqit yatiñpa.
Aka, jariyañ nayraqat sañ muniw wawanakasaruw churañaw mä jach´ yäqaw yatiñ tuqita, lurañ tuqita, amuyt´añ tuqita, kunkix jilxatayañatakix ajayuchit tuqit amuyunak, amuyt´asimpataki. Akast janiw sañ munkit wawanakar nayrapt´ayañatakixa, ansas sañ muniw churañasaw taqi amuyt´asiñanka, churañaw mitaparjam janiw aka amuyt´awinkast jilañapakiti, janiw atipasiñätakititi, yatiqañatakiw taqikunakaw wakisk mitaparjam lurawinak yatiqañataki. 
Aka, arust uñstiw khä, wawanakat kamachiwipat mä waranq llatunk patak phisq tunk llatunkani, luratanw wawanakatakipuniw t´aqh yuripkan ukanakatakipuninwa. Akasti, yariyañatakinw wanakarur wisamkipxki ukhanakaru. Aka amuyust t´aqhinkir wawanakasti, ch´amanchiw qallt jariyañ alw tuqita. 
Wakichawipanxa sanx (Lopez, 2004) Aka arusti, sañ munanxa, yatiqañ nayraqata, wali askiw parlañatax jariyan nayraqatamp yatiqañampita. Amuyutapï, arkiripaw sasin taq wawankan thaxpach sayañakapax sapaqatankirinakapa, akastix jikxatañatakiw kunayman lurawinak yatiqañatak (janchipachstuqita, markapttuqita, chiqa sarta, chuyman sarawtuqita, yäqañtuqita, ch´ikhituqita, ukatuqitanakata) waliñkañtuqita. Ukhämapuninkaw yatiqañanaka. 
Akax qatuqasin sañaspäw yatiqawix amuyt´athawa jayriyañ nayraqatax arknaqiwa kunkitix jikxatañax wawanakan wakisk ukhanax Jikirañatak ch´allxtawinakata, ch´amanchañ ch´ikhituqita, munasïwtuqita, llamp´utuqita, ukanakata.
QHANANCHSUÑ ARUT AMUYUPATA (DESARROLLO DEL LENGUAJE)
Ar amuyusti sum yatiyawitakiw jaqinakampi parlasiñataki, ukast sarañapawa kasta kasta ajllit arunak kawkins uñt´añaw kunayman lurawinaka:
1. qallta saraw wakiskir amuyumpï . mä kut yurripxï, wawanakast niyaw jupanakax yatipxi, ch´amusiñ ukhämat ñuñ thaqhapxi manq´añlayku. Ukampisa, wawanakax niyaw qalltapxi kunkärsuñax unqxtasa ispillillumpi, ananampi, laxrampi, sunqurump samananak sum samsunanaka, ukasti, arunak lurasin taq kastanaka. 
2.Uñstawinak amuyuña. Akasti, wawankasaruw qatuqayiw arunaka (qatuqayiw ist´añanakata) ukat kamisak qamawipnax kunjamans ukhämañapawa. Ukast nayrir yanapt´awix kunjakastanakas arunakax utjki, munt´awisanxa, ukanakat payïr yanapt´awix uñt´añatakiw kawkir arunakas kusisiychi anch ukanaka. Kunatix mamapaw anatxayki, ukhanaka.
3. ch´ikhinak amuyaña. Akä pachasti aru pirwapast walpuniw jiljatxi sapürutkamawa, aruw pirwapax pä tunkaruw yäpt´axi. Ukhamarus niya, pä marar purkix ukhswa, Phisqa maranix ukati, aru pirwapast makatxiwa mä waranq phisq patakaniruwa. Ukhaskti qalltakiniw thiwjanakampinkaw amuyt´ayasiñatakix ukhasti, palasjañatak uñt´at sutinaka. Qhiphänakarust arsuskaniwa, aruchirinaka, suti lantinaka, taqi ukanaka. Ukhaskti apnaqarakiw arukax walja kastanakatawa sun arsuñkama. 
4. jaqinakan kamawinakapa amuyta. Ukhamata, wawax jach´apthayïw amuyunakapax kunkit uraqpachata, t´aqa jaqinakan kamakipanx urpast aski jasachañatakiw amuyunakax yäqanakata. Qamakipanaja, sumapuniw yatiq ukast lurasiw mä sum jariyaw wawanakasatak utjayañap arunakampi. (Bolaños, 2001).
AWKINAK TAYKANAK JANIW CHURAPXKIT WAKISKIR JAYRIYAÑ NAYRAQAT WAWANAKAR SARAMPATAK YATIQAÑ UTARU
Uñtawinakat akä, jach´a markan utjiw walja jaqinakaw qamasipxi wali taqhisiñanxa, uka utanakanx janiw yatipxkit aka wakisir jaryañ nayraqatata. Aka jan walt´awit walj laykutanakatawa, pisi qulqinaka, jaqinakan qamawinakapa, jaqi lurawi, jupanakast janiw churapkiti, mä sum yanapt´awi sun sarñpataki wawanakaru. Jupanakax janiw yatipkanti, janiw khitis yatiyïr utjkanti, jach´a yatiqañ utanakasti, janirakiw atiykapkiti aka markaririnakaru. Parlasktanwa, aka, altu pata markat suna riu siki uksatuqita, aka sunasti Mariscal Sucre satanwa, distritu 4 ukata, Nayasti lurawaytwa mä jach´a yatxatawi, yatiqañ utax santwa “Libertad”.
Uka yatxatawin uñjawaytwa walja jan walinak wawanakast janiw yatipkant sum arusiñaka, ukasti qillqañ tuqitarakist janiw sun lurapxirikanti, ansas taqiniw sumpiniw yatixjatayñaw uka irnaqñanak janchimpi (motricidad gruesa) sataki, yaqä t´aqanaskti, (motricidad fina) ukasti walja yanapañaskanwa, ukasti, (personal y social) ukan ukhamarak walipun yanapt´askañanwa, ukaskti, (audición y lenguaje) yamakis walipuniw yanapañxanwa. Aka yatxatawix luratänwa khä yant´awi, Nelson Ortiz sata ukampi, uka yant´awimpix irnaqaxiw (wawa utanakata) ukanaka.
Awk taykanakast uka pachanakanx janiw yatkapkanti, yaqhapanakasti jukak yatipxana, yaqhanakast janiw yanapkapxant jik´a wawanakaparux ukhamarus niya thaxpachaniw awk taykanakat janiw yatipkanti ullañ qillqañas ukalaykutaw jupanakax sapjanwa, nanakax janiw atipxti wawanasarux yanapañ kuna laykutix jupanakax janiw yatiqañ utarux sarapkatanati. 
Janiw jupanakan pachapax utjkant wawanakaparux yanapt´añataki, jupanakaw ñakakiw irnaqaxan qullqitax pisikiw sarnaqapxanwa. Uka laykurak qullq utar apañ ukakiruw juchaskapxana. Wawanakar jaytasaw irnaqir sarsarpxiritayna, ukataw wawanakax wawapuraw utan qamapxiritayna. Wali t´aqhisiñakapxiw yaqhapanakax ukhamaw khamaxiritayna.
Uka laykunakat janiw yäqapkit wawanakaparux yaqhapanakax sapxanwa kunatakirakis irpañapach kinder ukarusti, ch´amaw yatiqañ utarux apaña, wali qullqitakiwa, sasaw arxayapxirnwa nayarusti. 
Ukat nayax jupakampiw parliriwa, wawanakar yanpt´aw tuqita, yanapañax wali ch´amanchañatakiw jiska wawanakax taqikunaw lurañ yatiñapa, mä wawast taqikun yatki ukasti wali sumapuniwa, janiw anch irnaqañaxit uka wawampixa.
KUNATAKIX JARIYAÑ NAYRAQATA 
1) Munañaw yatiyaw larañanakat wawax sumañapataki. 
2) Janir kunakipan wakiyañ jan uñtañpatak uka jan walinaka, janchinakata, ajayuchinakata, taqhi kast jaqinakata.
3) Lurañaw wakiskir wila masinakataki.
5) Yanapt´añaw musall sum amuypataki luk´anak apnakañpataki, aruns ukhamarak, ch´ikhinpatakix yatisiñpatakiwa.
KHITINAKATAKIS JARIYAÑ NAYRAQATA
1) usut warminakatakiwa, usutaki, usikipan may usisk ukaraki. 
2) Asukut suxta manankamawa.
3) Ñanqha niwrulujik insiphalunak wawanakataki. 
KAWKINAS APASIÑPA JARIYAÑ NAYRAQATASTI
Akasti, apasiñapaw wila masi thuqina, marqachirimpinakata, uka jak´anakan wal askipuniw jariyañ nayraqat tayk awkinakampi, yäqha wila masinakampinak sumankañapaw wawanakampi, ukasti, utxañapaw yurq uka phaspana. 
Nayraqataw taykanakapuniw yätichix suma yatichawinakampi, waskiskir yätichawinakampi, ukast wali jasakiw yatiqawix wawanakataki. Taykanak wawamp yäqa wila masinakampinakampix sumankañanipxañapawa, ukataw ajllirañ wakichawinak sumankañapax sum musanakap wawanakasas sarañpataki, yatiyaw tuqitq, markapat tuqita, p´iqi amuyut tuqita, ukatuqitanakata. 
Aka kasta yatiqañanakast lurasiw sum yatiñpataki, jichjtayañataki, musanakapast jaqimpiñataki, chuym ch´allxtayäsinaki, ch´ikhiñpataki, ukasti, taqi akanast yanapt´aniw taxpach yatiqawinakanxa, kamachinakanapan qamasiwinakanpaxa.
KUNA MARARUS WALISPAX JARIYAÑ NAYRAQATA
Lurañaw jariyañ nayraqatax wali isk´at pachataw purakankipxpachaw lurañaxa, nayaraqtasti, jaylliwinakaw isch´ukiyaña, akasta suxta marankamawa, asukut pachatwa. Niya kimsa maranitast amuypast yapt´asiw wlajaru phisiwlujikamintiw jariyañ inamp walja, plastisidad siribral sapxkijä, aski walipuniw kimsa tunk suxtan phaxsikamaxa.
Sawipanxa (Mendoza, 2000), pusi phaxsinix ukhasti, ukarsaw qalltix jariyaña: uñjantuqi, isch´ukiñtuqi, ch´amampkatjañtuqi, samsuñ ullqiñatuqi, wakiasiñ arsuñtuqi, khakhañtuqi, k´usiñtuqi, ukanakawa. Suxta phaxsinxi ukasti, yatxiwa walja yatiqawinaka, kumpnaqañ yatxiwa, sarnaqañ qallxañapawa, jach´anakarust amuyxiw parlasiwipana, amuyäñaw arunakamp anatañanakap uñichayañasa, lurawinak amtatanak tukuyañawa.
TUKT´AYAWI (CONCLUSIONES)
Juka´a jariyañ nayraqat wawanakarux tayk awinakast janiw yatipkiti, aka wakiskir amayuta, kuna, laykitix qamapxiw pist´qullqita, amuyunakas mayjarakiwa, sarta surawix mayjarawika taqi uka jila masinakan yämakis janipuniw utjkit mä suma wakiskir yänapt´awix jisk´a wawanakaru. Ukampis wali askipunispaw mä wawa utax ukhänakan ukast askichaspaw yänpt´aspaw walipun walj wawanakaru, uka jariyañ nayraqat tuqita.
Amt phuqhawisti, jayriñ nayraqat ukansti, uñt´añawa thaxpach amuyunakap tuqi, lurawinakap tuqita, sapa mayn wawanakana.
Ukasti, sum amuyuñarakiw janiw taqpach wawanakax kipqapurapkiti, ansas sapamayniwa, mayjatarakiw qatuq yatiqañanaka, ukhamarus aruskasiwins pachparakiwa. Tayk awkinakast yatipxañpaw kawkikamas sum jayriyañapuw janiw anch walj jayriyäñakiti.
Tayk awkinakasti, sumpuniw amuyupxañapuniw kunatix jayriyañ uqsatuqita, yänapt´añpapxapuniw yämakis churañaw wallj iyawsawinaka, ch´amanchawinaka. Ukataw saña, utanapuniw qalltañ sum jayriyan wawanakasarux suma yatiñchawinakampinakax yatichaña.

Lurayir mayjt'ayiri:
Lurayiri mayjt'ayirix mä lurayiri aruru mayjt'ayi kunatixa aka mayjt'ayirixa wali apnaqasi aru tamanakana.

Lord Byron:
Lord Byron George Gordon Byron, (* London, 1788 mara 22 uru Chichu phaxsin yuritayna - Mesolongi, 1824 mara 19 uru Yapu apthapi phaxsin sarawayxarakitayna), jacha marka inlish qillqiri. 
Awki: John Byron, Tayka: <br>Warminaka: Anna Isabella Noel Byron / Jane Harley, Countess of Oxford and Countess Mortimer <br>Yuqanaka: Augusta Ada Byron, Clara Allegra.

Soong May-ling:
Soong May-ling (Chino simplificado: 宋美龄, Chino tradicional: 宋美齡, pinyin: Sòng Meilíng, Wade-Giles: Sung May-ling), (Kunshan, 1897 uru Chichu phaxsin yuritayna -, 2003 uru Llamayu phaxsin yuriwi ).
Awki: Charlie Soong; Tayka: Ni Kwei-tseng
Qusannaka:Chiang Kai-shek
Aruskipäwi.
Chiang Kai-shek

Teodoro Núñez Ureta:
Teodoro Núñez Ureta chacha (Ariqipa llaqtapi, 1912 mara yuritayna - llaqtapi, 1988 mara yuriwi) huk jacha marka yäpa llimphiri. 

Albert Camus:
Albert Camus (* Mondovi marka, 1913 mara 7 uru Awti phaxsin yuritayna - Le Petit Villeblevin marka, 1960 mara 4 uru Chichu phaxsin yuriwi), jach'a marka Lup'intawiri & qillqiri.

Munasiña:
Munasiñax chuymat juti ukhamarus taqi kunaruw muntan. Sañäni tayk awkiruw muntan ukhamarak wawanakasarusa, saraksnawa taqi yanakarus munarakiksnawa.

Manuel Antônio de Almeida:
Manuel Antônio de Almeida suti (* Rio de Janeiro, 1831 mara 17 uru Awti phaxsin yuritayna - Macaé, 1861 mara 28 uru Awti phaxsin sarawayxarakitayna), jacha marka qillqiri. 
Awki: Antônio de Almeida, Tayka: Josefina Maria de Almeida.

Joaquim Machado:
Joaquim Machado de Assis suti (* Rio de Janeiro, 1839 mara 21 uru Juyphi phaxsin yuritayna - Rio de Janeiro, 1908 mara 29 uru Ll'ampu phaxsin sarawayxarakitayna), jacha marka qillqiri. 
Awki: Francisco José de Assis, Tayka: Maria Leopoldina Machado. <br>Warmi: Carolina Augusta Xavier de Novais.

Luis de Góngora:
Luis de Góngora y Argote (* Córdoba, 1561 mara 11 uru Huillka kuti phaxsin yuritayna - Córdoba, 1627 mara 23 uru Llamayu phaxsin yuriwi) jacha marka qillqiri. 
Awki: Francisco de Argote; Tayka: Leonor de Góngora.<br>Warmi: 

Lope de Vega:
Lope Félix de Vega Carpio (* Madrid, 1562 mara 25 uru Awti phaxsin yuritayna - Madrid, 1635 mara 27 uru Thaya phaxsin yuriwi) jacha marka qillqiri & taytakura. 
Awki: Félix de Vega; Tayka: Francisca Fernández Flórez.

Francisco de Quevedo:
Francisco Gómez de Quevedo Villegas y Santibáñez Cevallos (* Madrid, 1580 mara 14 uru Llamp'u phaxsin yuritayna - Madrid, 1645 mara 8 uru Llamp'u phaxsin yuriwi) jacha marka qillqiri. 
Awki: Pedro Gómez de Quevedo; Tayka: María de Santibáñez.

Tirso de Molina:
Gabriel Téllez suti, Tirso de Molina (* Madrid, 1579 mara 24 uru Achuqa phaxsin yuritayna - † Almazán, 1648 mara 12 uru Achuqa phaxsin yuriwi), jacha marka taytakura & qillqiri.

Šiprage:
Šiprage (Шипраге) е aru di Busña Hirsikuwina.

Charles Dickens:
Charles John Huffam Dickens suti "Boz" (* Portsmouth, 1812 mara 7 uru Anata phaxsin - † Higham, 1870 mara 9 uru Juyphi phaxsin) jacha marka qillqiri.
Awki: John Dickens (1786-1851), Tayka: Elizabeth Barrow (1789-1863).

Walt Whitman:
Walt Whitman (* West Hills, 1819 mara 31 uru Llamayu phaxsin - Camden, 1892 mara 26 uru Achuqa phaxsin), jacha marka qillqiri.

Tunta:
Tunta, ukax mä manq’awa, aymar qhichwanaktaypin juk'ampis uñt'atawa. Janïra aka Bolivia marka utt’atakänxa ukhatpach lurasipunitaynawa. Jichhurunakax tunta manq’ax utjaskiwa ukampirus lurataskiwa. Tuntax imañatak luratawa, niyas Ch’uñu kipkakiwa, ukhamipanxa tuntax ch’uqitwa lurasi, janiw kuna ch’amakisa. Juk'ampis luq'i ch'uqitx wali sumapuniwa. 
Kunawsas uñstanitäna.
Tuntax nayra jaqinak utxkän ukhanakatpach jupanakax uñstayanipxatayna. Jupanakax manq’a wali jayanak imañatakiw lurapxirïtana. Ukhamarus mach’a pachanak utxkänxa ukhanak manq’asiñatakïnwa, jichhanakax uka kikiparakiw imasitaski ukhamarus anqax markanakaruw aljataxaraki. Chanipax wali jilawa.
Kunjam lurañasa.
Ch’uqit tuntarux kutikiptayaña. 
Nayrïri..
Nayraqatpachxa ch’uqi llamaysutatxa, ch’ukix jach’akama, tantiykama, jisk’akama ukhamaw ajlliña ukhamipanxa niyas jach’anakakix ukaw tunatatakixa ukamapirus yaqhip markanakanx tunta ch’uqix utxarakiwa. Juk'ampis luk'i ch'uqitx wali suma tuntanakapuniw mistsu, ukhamarak waka laxra ch'uqitsa. 
Payïri..
Ukxaruxa jach’pach chuqinak ajllitax juyphiruw waratataña ukansti pa aruma jan ukax ma arumakisa juyphitjamaw waratatatañapa, ukatx sapa alwaw janir intix mistsunki ukhaw jan chullurañapatak apthapiña. 
Kimisïri..
Kunawsatix suma juypin luxuntayataxi, ukhaw qutpach jalir umaru jichhu yayuntatar warantañäxi ukax suma llawthapt’atañapawa pusi, phisqa simananakaw ukankañapa. 
Pusïri..
Ukha urunak phuqatatsti juyphitakirakiw apsxaña, wali sum waratatt’asina khiparmanth alwasti janïr intix sunx waysunkix ukharakiw apthapxaña, janiratix sum luxutakchix wasitatwa waratataña, niyas suma luxutañapawa.
Phisqïri..
Khipxarusti mä p’iya allsutaruw waka lip’ichjaruw taksuña jan ukax jichha pachanakax chikat turil jaltatayataruw taksxapxaraki, wali suma q’alakiñapawa ukat taksutatxa kanastar warsusinx umaruw wayuntañ jarst’añataki ukat wañicht’xañataki. Tuntax ukhamakiw lurt’añataña.
Phayasxañataki imasxañataki.
Phayasiñatakix tuntax mä qawqha q’atanakan chullt’akiwa janiw ch’uñjam chulluchañakiti jan ukasti mäkiw chullt’i ukant phukhur jarintasinx phayasitakixiwa. Wali jayanak imañatakix tuturat sixi lurataruw imasiña jan ukax kartun turilarusa sapa aylluw kunjam imasiñs yati. Tuntampix walxa kast manq’anakwa wakt’ayasma. 

K'añasku:
K'añaskux jan ukasti awtu, jaqir uywar yänak apiriwa. Mä yäwa, taqi chiqanakaruw q'ipirakstaspa. Ukhamarus taqi markanakaruw sari, wali jathi q'ipinaksa apnaqarakiwa.
Nayrapacha.
Nayrapachax janiw k'añaskux kunjamakitix jichhurunx ukham utjirikataynati. K'achat k'achat kunayman k'añaskunax uñtaniwayxi.
Pachaxchu.
Pachaxchux jach'a awtunakawa.

F. Scott Fitzgerald:
Francis Key Scott Fitzgerald suti (* St.Paul, Minnesota, 1896 marka 24 uru Llamp'u phaxsin yuritayna - Hollywood, Los Angeles, 1940 mara 21 uru Jallu qallta phaxsin yuriwi), jacha marka qillqiri.

José Enrique Rodó:
José Enrique Rodó, (* Muntividëw, 1871 mara 15 uru Huillka kuti phaxsin yuritayna - Palermo, 1917 mara 1 uru Llamayu phaxsin yuriwi), jacha marka qillqiri. 
1902 mara Uruwayi apulliq.

Juan Carlos Onetti:
Juan Carlos Onetti Borges suti (* Muntividëw, 1909 mara 1 uru Huillka kuti phaxsin yuritayna - Madrid, 1994 mara 30 uru Llamayu phaxsin yuriwi) jacha marka kastilla arupi qillqiri.
Awki: Carlos Onetti Tayka: Honoria Borges.<br>Warminaka: María Amalia Onetti (1930-1933) / María Julia Onetti / Elizabeth María Pekelharing / Dorothea Muhr <br>Yuqanaka: Jorge Onetti Borges (1930-1998) & Isabel María (1949).

Antoine-Laurent de Lavoisier suti (* Paris, 1743 mara 26 uru Thaya phaxsin yuritayna - Paris, 1794 mara 8 uru Llamayu phaxsin yuriwi), jacha marka kimika yatxatawiri.

Rosa Merino:
Rosa Merino de Arenas suti warmi (Lima, 1790 mara yuritayna - Lima, 1868 mara 1 uru Awti phaxsin yuriwi), huk jacha marka yäpari supranu q'uchu arsuyaña warmi.

Carmen Martín:
Carmen Martín Gaite (* Salamanca, 1925 mara 8 uru Awti phaxsin yuritayna - Madrid, 2000 mara 23 uru Huillka kuti phaxsin yuriwi) jacha marka qillqiri.

Yingluck Shinawatra:
Yingluck Shinawatra, thay aru: ยิ่งลักษณ์ ชินวัตร, (* San Kamphaeng, 1967 mara 21 uru Juyphi phaxsin yuritayna - ), Taylandya jacha marka anakithiri.
Uma kamayuq (2011- ).
Awki: Lert Shinawatra; Tayka: Yindi Ramingwong.<br> Ñawpaq qusan: Anusorn Amornchat <br>Yuqanaka: Supasek Amornchat.
Yatiñ Uta: Regina Coeli College wan Yupparaj College.
Alma mater: Chiang Mai Jach'a Yatiñ Uta & Jacha marka Kentucky Jach'a Yatiñ Uta.

Ayni:
Aynix, maynit maynikam yanapt’asiñäki ukawa, yanapt’asiwinakax pata pampanakan jilpachx arusita ukhamarak lurawimpis uñicht’ayataraki. Yanapt’asiñanx jan ch’am pist’ayasaw mä wawar tukt’asaw irnaqata.
¿Khitinakas yanapt’asipxi?
Jilir Awki Taykanakaw sumpach yatxatatapxi aka maynit maynikam yanapt’asiñ tuqiktxa, ukampis jupanakarakiw p’iqiñchapxaraki sasina: “jichhurux jumanakatakiw lurt’atani ukat arumanthix nanakatakirakiw lurt’atani”. Ukham sasin ma Jila Kullakakipuniw irnaqata jan ch’am pist’ayasisa.
Ukat uk uñjasax sullkir wayna tawakunakax jank’akiw lurapxaraki maynit maynikam jan uñisisiñampi uka pachparak jisk’a lalanakas sapuruw yatintawinkapxaraki.
¿Kuna irnaqawinakans yanapt’asipxi?
Jilpachax khaysa pata pampa, kullu pata ukhamarak khirwa tuqinakan uñjasix lurawimpi.
Uta utachawinakana:.
utachawinakanx jank’akipuniw maynit maynikamax yanapt’asita, ma jakañawjantix maynix uta utachasiñ kalltix ukhax jank’akipuniw mayni jilat kullakanakax sarapxi.Ukath janiw ch’usa amparakix sarapkaspati jan ukasti ma uka phat’antañatakis, pirqañatakis apasiñaparaki. Ukat kunapachatix yanapirix utachasini ukhax yanapx yatuqxarakini, ukhamat ma jila kullakaki suman jakañataki.
Yapu irnaqawinakana:.
ukhamarakikiw aksa tukinakanx yanapt’asita, jank’a jusachañatak ukhamat tukxañataki, ukatakix mayniruw nayraqatax yanapt’ata ukhamat qhipurux maynitakiraki.
Uywa uywawina awatiñanakana:.
uka pachparakik uywa uywañanakansa awatiwinakansa, maynit maynikamax janapt’asitapuni. Ma urux maynitak awatiña, khipurusti maynitakirak awatxaña.
Ayllu irptawi taypinakana:.
aksa tukinakanx chacha warmiw sayt’apxi.
¿Khitinakarus yanapt’ata?
Aymar markanakasanx taqiniw maynit maynikamax yanapt’asita, juk’ampis ijma mama tatanakaru, wajcha wawanakaru, chhuyu jaqichasitanakar ukhamarak jilir awki taykanakaruw yanapt’ata. Ukhamat jan aynacht’apxañapataki.
¿Kunats yanapt’asipxi?
Aymar jaqinakan chuymapanx maynit maynikam munasiña yanapt’asisa ukaw utxi. Maynitix sapak lurasiski ukarux janiw ukhamakix uñch’ukitakaspati jan ukasti makipuniw yanapt’asita. 
¿Kunatakis yanapt’asipxi?
Kullasuyu markan kamachinakapax “suma qamacha” ukar thakhiñchañasaw sarakiw arst’awayi ukatsti aymar jakawisanx ma khuskhakirakitanwa, janiw khitin aynacht’añaps munktanti, ukataw maynit maynikam yanapt’asita.

Raúl García Zárate:
Raúl García Zárate , (* Ayaquchu, 1931 mara 13 uru Jallu qallta phaxsin yuritayna - Lima, 2017 mara 29 uru Taypi sata phaxsin yuriwi), jacha marka arxatiri & ankirïw suma q'uchux achuyirin kitaririchiw.

José Gervasio Artigas Arnal suti (* Muntividëw, 1764 mara 19 uru Juyphi phaxsin yuritayna - Ibiray, 1850 mara 23 uru Llamp'u phaxsin yuriwi), jacha marka llaqtap militar & anakithiri.

Immanuel Kant:
Immanuel Kant suti ( Königsberg, 1724 mara 22 uru Yapu apthapi phaxsin yuritayna - Königsberg 1804 mara 12 uru Anata phaxsin yuriwi) jacha marka Lup'intawiri.

Chhuqha:
Chhuqhax mä quta jamach'iwa "(Zoo. mf. científico sutipax: Fulica giantea. Tama: Rallidae)".
Janchipa.
Jach'a jamach'inak kastawa. Pä chhiy kimsa chhiy ukch'anakaw jilapxi. Ch'iyaraw phuyunakapaxa. P'iqipax jisk'akiwa, khirupax ch'iyar wilawa. Chhuruñapax pampill janq'uwa, kayunakapax ch'uxñawa. 
Manq'apa.
Parinax quta jisk'a laq'unak manq'i, ukhamarak quta quranaks manq'akirakiwa. 
Tapapa.
Tapapax qutapatxankiwa, t'ut'urat lurataw tapapaxa.
K'awnapa.
Qachu chhuqhax 7 q'awn q'awnanti. Uka k'awnanakapax q'illuwa, ukhamarak ch'iyar ch'ixinakaniwa. 
Manq'añataki.
Chhuqhax wali sumaw manq'añatakixa, ukhamarus wali thaqhatarakiwa. 

Ch'ayña:
Ch'ayña, Ch'iyar jamach'i, ch'ayñita, ch'añarix jisk'a pampa jamach'iwa, "(zool. mf. cientifico suti: Carduelis atrata. Tama: Fringillidae)" ukham uñt'atarakiwa.
Janchipa.
Mä chhiy jamach'iwa, ch'iyar phuyuniwa, chhiqharux q'illump janq'ump arktatawa. T'isktas t"isktas jaltirinakawa. 
Manq'apa.
Ch'ayñax jisk'a achunaka, alinakan panqaranakapa, ukhamarak jisk'a laq'unak pallasipxaraki. 
Tapapa.
Tapapax mä jaruch (tasa) ukch'awa. Jisk'a alinakampit t'arwanakampit tapapax luratawa. Tapanakapx qarqa k'uchunakaru, quqa alinakjaru, pampa ch'amphanakarus k'awnapxakiwa. Yaqhippachanakax tam tamaw sarnaqapxi.
Q'awnapa.
Ch'ayñax pusi k'awn k'awni. Uka k'awnapax mä jukit laramar uñtatawa, yaqhippachanakax uka k'awnapax ch'ixinakaniwa. 

Richard Burton:
Richard Walter Jenkin suti Richard Burton (* Pontrhydyfen, 1925 mara 10 uru Awti phaxsin yuritayna - Celigny, 1984 mara 5 uru Thaya phaxsin) Kamri jacha marka yäpari.
Awkiː Richard Walter Jenkins; Taykaː Edith Maude (Thomas)<br>Warminaka: Sybil Williams (1949-1963) / Elizabeth Taylor (1964-1974, 1975-1976) / Susan Hunt (1976-1982) / Sally Hay (1983-1984)<br>Yuqanaka: Kate Burton (1957), Jessica Burton (1959), Liza Todd Burton (1957) wan Maria Burton (1961)
Alma materː Exeter College.

Emmeline Pankhurst:
Emmeline Pankhurst Goulden suti (Manchester, 1858 mara 14 uru Huillka kuti phaxsin yuritayna - London, 1928 mara 14 uru Juyphi phaxsin yuriwi) huk jacha marka anakithiri.

Harriet Tubman:
"Araminta Ross" suti warmi, 
Harriet Tubman ( Dorchester County (Maryland), 1822 mara yuritayna - Auburn, 1913 mara 10 uru Achuqa phaxsin yuriwi),
huk jacha marka anakithiri qarqan.
Qusanaka: John Tubman (1844–1851) /
Nelson Davis (1869-1888).<br>Yuqanaka: Gertie.

Dante Alighieri:
Dante Alighieri suti (Firenze, 1265 mara 29 uru Llamayu phaxsin yuritayna - Ravenna, 1321 mara 14 uru Llamp'u phaxsin yuriwi) huk jacha marka qillqiri.

Ravenna:
Ravenna (kastilla aru: Rávena), marka Italiya
Regione Emilia-Romagna.
Irpirinaka.
Sindaco: Michele De Pascale (PD) (20-6-2016 - )

Siena:
Siena (kastilla aru: Siena), marka Italiya
Irpirinaka.
Sindaco: Bruno Valentini (PD) (10-6-2013 - )

Ch'usiqa:
Ch'usiqa jan ukasti ch'usaqax mä tantiy jamach'iwa "(zool. mf. cientifico suti: Speotyto cunicularia. Tama: Tytonidae)". Qhirwatuqin sunituqin utjir jamach'iwa.
Janchipa.
Ch'usiq kast jamach'inakaxa, chhiqhanakapanx ch'umphi ch'ixinakananiwa. Aka jamach'ix kimsa chhiy jilawa. P'iqipax muruq'uwa, jach'a nayranakaniwa, chhuruñapax k'umt'atawa.
Manq'apa.
Ch'usiqan manq'apax achakunakawa, jararankhunaks katusipxarakiwa. Alay wayrar mistusinwa, katuñatakix uñch'ukinipxi.
Chimpupa.
Kunawsatix ch'usiqax jaqir uñstkixa, jan wali w sasaw sapxi. Kunawsatix utapatxanakar jutixa, jaqi jiwani sasaw sapxaraki. 

K'alla:
K'alla jan ukax k'allallax mä ch'uxña jamach'iwa, "(Zoool. mf. Cietifico sutipa: bolborhynchus aurifrons, tama: Psittacidae)". Juk'ampis aka jamach'ix qhirwa junt'u markanakan qamapxi. K'all k'all k'all sasaw jalnaqi, ukatwa k'alla sutini.
Janchipa.
K'allax mä chhiy jilakiwa. Phuyunkapax ch'uxñawa, ukhamarak kawkirus jatt'kattaskakiwa. P'iqipax muruq'uwa, nayritapax ch'iyaritawa, chhuruñapax k'umuwa, ukhamarak ch'iyarawa. Wichhinkhapax jach'awa, ukhamarak thuruwa. K'allax phuyunakapanx q'illunakamp q'illuñchatawa. 
Manq'apa.
Pampa achunakampiw jaki, yaqhippachanakax jisk'a laq'unaks manq'asikirakiwa. 
Tapapa.
Jawir parkinakaruw tapachapxi, jan ukax quqaquq parkinakarus tapachapxarakiwa. K'allax tamanpun juk'ampis sarnaqapxi. 
K'awnapa.
Qachu k'allax paya jan ukax pusi k'awnwa k'awnanti. K'awnanakapax janq'uwa. 

Pukupuku:
Pukupuku jan ukax pukusux pampa jamach'iwa, (Zool. mf. cientifico suti: Graybreasted Secdsnip, tama: Thinocorus). Pukus pukus pukus sasaw jachi, ukatwa pukupuku sutini.
Janchipa.
Pukupukux tantiy jamach'iwa, mä chhiy chikanjamawa. Phuyunakapax ch'ixi ch'umphiwa, ukhamarak uka phuyunakapanx janq'u p'uyunakaniwa. P'iqipamp kunkapampix qaqawa. Chhuruñapax jisk'akiwa, ukhamarak mayj q'illuratawa, chhuru thiyax ch'iyart'atarakiwa. 
Manq'apa.
Pukupukux ch'uxña chhuxllanak ukhamarak jisk'a laq'unak manq'añatakix thaqhasipxi. Pukupukux juk'ampis ch'uxñanakakpun manq'apxi. 
Jakäwipa.
Pukupukux panipuniw sarnaqi, juka'mpis umillk'awjanakan qamasipxi. Kunawsatix jaqir uñjixa, wali axsarasaw qala qhipaxanakar qarqa qhipaxanakar imantasipxi. Pukupukux wali jayanak ch'usasipxi. Aka jamach'inakax qhanapuniw qachump urqumpi sarnaqapxi. Urqun mutyupampi kunkapampixa qhilla saminchatawa. Qachunsti ina ch'ixikiwa. Ukhamatwa pukupukuruxa uñat'akipsna.
K'awnapa.
Qachu pukupukux pusi k'awnwa, k'awni. K'awnapax janq'unakawa, ukhamarus ch'iyar ch'ixiñchatawa. Kunawsatix tapapat mistuwayapxixa, jisk'a llapanakampiw k'awnarux imxatawayi, jan lupintañapatak ukhamarak jan kunas manq'antañapataki. 
Yatiyäwipa.
Willjtanakax willjtanxiw sañatakiw jachapxi. Kunawsatix anarañampipkixa, wal pukus pukus pukus pukus sas jachapxi. 
Satapachanx kunawsatix pukus pukus pukus pukus sas jachapxixa, suma maraniw sañ muni. Ukattix tuxu waka, tuxu waka, tuxu waka sas jachapxixa, janiw suma marakanit sañrak muni.

Wallata:
Wallatax suni pampa jach'a jamach'iwa, "(Zool. mf. Cientifico suti: chloephaga melanoptera, tama: anatidae)". 
Janchipa.
Wallatax pusi chhiyat jilt'atawa, phuyunakapax janq'uwa, wich'inkhapawjax ch'iyararakiwa. Chhuruñapax thuruwa, kayunakapax wilawa ukhamarus thurunakarakiwa. 
Manq'apa.
Wallatax jisk'a laq'unakamp challwanakamp ch'uxña pastunakamp manq'añatakix thaqhasipxi. 
Jakäwipa.
Juk'ampis jawir lakanakan quta thiyanakan jant'awjanakan wichhu wichhuwjanakan qamapxi. Wallatax panipuniw jakasi, aksarus uksarus sarnaqapxi.
Wallatax wawanak anarasax jank'akipuniw q'ipxaruwayañ yatipxi. Q'ipxaruwayasax quta thiyanakar jawir thiyanakarux irpapxi. 
Ukhamarak aka jamach'inakax janiw mawjankapkakiti, jan ukasti wali jayanak ch'usasiñ yatipxi.
Tapapa.
Wallatax tapapx phuyunakat ukhamarak pastunakat tapachasipxi. Yaqhippachanakax qarqa thiyanakarus jan umawjanakarus tapachapxarakiwa.
K'awnapa.
Qachu wallatax phisqhat tunkakamaw k'awnantapxi. K'awnapax janq'u q'illuwa.
Yatiyäwi.
Kunawsatix wallatax pusits jan ukax suxtats jalnaqapxixa, ukhax sumaw juyranakax achun sañ muni. Ukhamarak kunawsatix wallatax waña uraqinakawjanakan sarkixa, ukax jalluw jalluntan sañrak muni.

Waq'ana:
Waq'ana jan ukax uru achachix mä jach'a pampa jamach'iwa, "(Zool. mf. cientifico suti: Nycticora, tama: Nycticorax)". Aka jamach'ix waq' waq' waq' waq'a sasaw jachi ukat waq'ana sutini.
Janchipa.
Waq'anax janiw sinti jach'a jamach'ikiti, mä chhiy jilakiwa. Jach'a chhiqhanakaniwa, ukhamarak chhuruñapax chiqakiwa. Sum sum amuyatax k'umt'atakipuniw sarnaqi.
Manq'apa.
Waq'anax walja kast manq'anak thaqhasi: jamp'atunaka, k'ayranaka, juq'ullunaka, jisk'a laq'unaka, jisk'a challwanaks manq'asipxakiwa. 
Jakäwipa.
Juk'ampis aka kast jamach'ix quta lakanakan jawir lakanakanpun juk'ampis qamapxi. Sapa sapakiw juk'ampis sarnaqapxi, yaqhippachanakax paninis sarnaqapxakirakiwa. 
Tapapa.
Waq'anax jisk'a lawanakat tapachasi. 
K'awnapa.
Kimsa pusi k'awn k'awnapxi, uka k'awnanakax pampill muruq'uwa, janiw maysax juch'usar tukuyatakiti. 

Tikitiki:
Tikitiki jan ukax tikilux mä quta jamach'iwa "(Zool. Cientifico suti: Gallinula Chloropus, Tama: Rallidae)". Tik tik tik tik sasaw sarnaqapxi, ukatwa ukham sutini.

Jean-Jacques Rousseau:
Jean-Jacques Rousseau suti (* Genève 1712 mara 28 uru Juyphi phaxsin yuritayna - Ermenonville, 1778 mara 2 uru Huillka kuti phaxsin yuriwi) Switsira jacha marka Yachachijg Yatichiri & qillqiri.
Awki: Isaac Rousseau (Genève, 1672 – Nyon, 1747), Tayka: Suzanne Bernard (Genève, 1673 – ibídem, 1712).

K'uwisu:
K’uwisux, ñuñur ch’aslalir wank’uwa. Ukampirus walja sutinakamp uñt’atarakiwa, uka sutinakax aknïrinakawa: Guinea pigs, kuwayus, kawya, India kunijillus, akuri ukhamarus kuri. Awyayala uraqisan uñstanitayna, Peru, Bolivia, Colombia markanakan uta uywapxataynawa.
Janchipa.
Jinchupax muruqt’atawa, kayunakapax jisk’akiwa ukatx 8 maranakaw jakapxaspa.
Jakäwipa.
Aka wank’unakax ch’uxna kunayman quranak manq’asirinakawa. Ukatx 2Kg jila jathikamaw purispa ukampirus 40 Cm. ukch'aw jilarakispa. 
Wawaniñataki.
Mirtapxañatakix 60n urunakatwa walq’iptapxaspa, qachu wanq’unakax 5 kutiw maranx wawachapxaspa ukatx 65 urunakatx wawachapxakiwa.
Wawanakax lakapach niya sarnaqirpachaw wawachata ukatx ukurunakpachax kuranakwa manq’asipxi. Kunayman saminakaniwa utji wank’u wawanakaxa.
Qullasiñataki.
Kunawasatix jaqix wawaniki ukat usutaspa ukatakix qullawa.
Thaxapa.
Thaxapax yapuchañatakiw wali askipuni.

Tintoretto:
Tintoretto (Jacopo Comin) suti ( Venezia, 1518 mara 29 uru Llamp'u phaxsin yuritayna - Venezia, 1594 mara 31 uru Llamayu phaxsin yuriwi) huk jacha marka Yäpa llimphiri.

Nayluna wayaqanaxa:
Nayluna wayaqanaxa pachamamaru ñanqhachi
Uka nayluna wayaqanaka alasiñataki wali yatitawa mayiña. Uka nayluna wayaqax jani waliwa pachamamatakixa.
Nayluna wayaqax uñtawayiwa 1935 marana, mistuwayiwa aljaña qhathunakaru 1938, petroliyuta luratawa jupalayku WALLANCE HUT tata. Uñstawayi ukata jichhakamaxa taqichaqa qhathunakana nayluna nayaqaxa utji aljañataki.
Nayluna wayaqaxa janiwa ratuki chhaxkapati. Kunatixa 500 maranakawa jani chhaxkaspati. Ukampisa nayluna wayaqaxa pachamamaruxa janiwa walt´ayiti sañani waywanakaru, achanakaru, uma qutaru juk´ampinakaru.
Iwxawi(recomendaciones)
Nayluna wayaqaxa turktataxañapawa ecológico ukampi kunatixa wayaqa ecologicoxa askiwa qamawisatakixa.

Index:
QHANANCHIR PACHAMAMANKIRINAKA (QAMAQI)
P`IQINCHIRI:
Aka qhanancririnakax nayrj pach achachilinakan amuyupawa kunjamatix jichha pachaprakiw lurasipki nayrj pachata.
Jupanakan amtawinakapax sayt`ayanatak jan kuna pasañapataki kunjamatix jallus utji, lupi, juyphi, junk`ampi nakat ukhamarak satañ uksatuqinakaya
UÑT`AYAWI: 
Qamaqix wali uñt`atawa markachirinakata patatuqin uksanakana aka uywax uñt`ayna pachamam uksa tuqita kunjamatix waxasiwip ist`asin yatxapxanawa kunas jutan uka .nayraqat phaxsin yapu lurawin uñch`ukipxwa qhanañchawi phaxsi ch`uqi satawi.
Taqikunat sapa markan utki ukanakax qhanañchapxiwa taqikunat paskasp uksa tuqita, qamaqix ukhamarak uwij aychanak manq`iriwa.
Janq`u ukax qhanañchiwa pachamamax sumakiskarakiwa ukhamarak yapu lurawinakax sumakiskaniwa ukhamarak ch`uñu chawisa .
Uqini ukhax qhanañcharakiwa janiw ancha sumakaniti jach`a pach ukharak jisk`a pacha
Utjani ch`akanak ukax qhanañchiwa walja jisk`a uywanak uka taqi kast uywanakata.
Jikjatasini puch ch`uñuta ukamarak jupha, siwara,ch`uq ukanakax qhanañchapxarakiwa pachax askikiniwa taqi kast yapuchawi nakataki.
Sinti siwar sapax jikjatasini ukhax siwarax qhanañchakiwa uka maran siwaraki sum achurakispa.
QAMAQIN AWULLAWIPA.
-Kunapachatix qamaqin awullawip ist`apki ukhax uñt`apxiwa kunayman kast amuyukwinaka jichhax unt`añaniwa akanaka.
-Kuna pachatix qamaqix wali qhana waxasi jan jaychjasisa ukhax qhanañchstuwa pachamama wali kiskaniwa jallu pachana thayapachana ukhamarak suma achuqawinaka.
-Kunapachatix qamaqix jaychjas ukhax qhanañcharakiwa m ajan suma mara juk`a jallumpiki wali thaya ukhamarak juyranakax janiw sum achupaskati.
TUKUYAWI:
Qalltat yupaychawit uka qhanañchirinkax jupanakakiw patapampan yatiyapxi ukhamat patapampanakan jupanakax amuyasipxana janiw qamaqipun yatiskapati pachatuqita waya uywanakaw yatiyir utjapxaraki .kunjamatix liq` liq` ukax uñtasakiw sarnaqapxana pachamama uksatuqina.sarnaqapxana.
Ukhamarakiw jichha pachan janiw yaqhapxiti qhanañchir uywanakaru.

Pierre-Auguste Renoir:
Pierre-Auguste Renoir suti (Limoges, 1841 mara 25 uru Anata phaxsin yuritayna - Cagnes-sur-Mer, 1919 mara 3 uru Jallu qallta phaxsin yuriwi) huk jacha marka yäpa llimphiyri.
Awki: Léonard Renoir.

Caravaggio:
Michelangelo Merisi da Caravaggio suti Caravaggio, (* Milano, 1571 mara 29 uru Llamp'u phaxsin yuritayna - † Porto Ércole, 1610 mara 18 uru Huillka kuti phaxsin yuriwi), jacha marka qillqiri, arkitiktu, iskultur & yäpa llimphiri.

Giuseppe Garibaldi:
Giuseppe Garibaldi, suti (* Niza, 1807 mara 4 Huillka kuti phaxsin yuritayna - † Caprera, 1882 mara 2 uru Juyphi phaxsin yuriwi), jacha marka militar & anakithiri. 
Awki: Domenico Garibaldi; Tayka: Rosa Raimondi.<br>Warmi: Ana Maria de Jesus Ribeiro, "Anita Garibaldi" suti warmiqa. <br>Yuqanaka: Menotti, Rosita, Teresita wan Ricciotti.

Antonio Gramsci:
Antonio Gramsci suti (* Ales, 1891 mara 22 uru Chichu phaxsin yuritayna - † Roma, 1937 mara 27 uru Yapu apthapi phaxsin yuriwi), jacha marka piriudysta, Lup'intawiri, qillqiri & anakithiri.
Awki: Francesco Gramsci (1860-1937); Tayka: Giuseppina Marcias (1861-1932).<br>Warmi: Peppina. <br>Yuqanaka: Gennaro (1884), Grazietta (1887), Emma (1889), Antonio (1891), Mario (1893), Teresina (1895) & Carlos (1897).

Daniel Alomía Robles:
Daniel Alomía Robles suti (* Wanuku, 1871 mara 3 uru Chichu phaxsin yuritayna - † Lima, 1942 mara 17 uru Huillka kuti phaxsin yuriwi), jacha marka Opera Jaylliphust'ari. 
Awki: Marcial Alomía (phransya jaqi), Tayka: Micaela Robles.<br>Yuqa: Armando Robles Godoy.

Armando Robles Godoy:
Armando Robles Godoy suti ( * New York, 1923 mara 7 uru Anata phaxsin yuritayna - † Lima, 2010 mara 10 uru Thaya phaxsin yuriwi) jacha marka qillqiri wan kuyu walltay pusaq. 
Awki: Daniel Alomía Robles, Tayka: Carmela Godoy. <br>Warmi: Ada Rey. <br>Yuqanaka: Marcela wan Delba. 

Miguel de Unamuno:
Miguel de Unamuno y Jugo (* Bilbao, 1864 mara 29 uru Llamp'u phaxsin yuritayna - Salamanca, 1936 mara 31 uru Jayu qallta phaxsin yuriwi) jacha marka lup'intawiri, anakithiri & qillqiri. 
Warmi: Concepción Lizárraga.<br>Yuqanaka: (9).

José Ortega y Gasset:
José Ortega y Gasset (Husi Urtiqa Qasit) suti (Madrid, 1883 mara 9 uru Llamayu phaxsin yuritayna - Madrid, 1955 mara 18 Taypi sata phaxsin yuriwi) huk jacha marka qillqiri & Lup'intawiri.
Awki: José Ortega Munilla.<br>Yuqanaka: José Ortega Spottorno & Soledad Ortega Spottorno.

Charles Aznavour:
Charles Aznavour, "Shahnourh Varinag Aznavourian (Շահնուր Վաղինակ Ազնավուրյան) " suti (* Paris, 1924 mara 22 uru Llamayu phaxsin yuritayna - Kierling, 2018 mara 1 uru Taypi sata phaxsin yuriwi), huk jacha marka yäpari, q'uchu arsuyaña & jaylliphust'ari.
Yuqanaka: Seda, Charles, Patrick, Katia, Misha & Nicolás.

Yves Montand:
Yves Montand suti (* Monsummano Terme, 1921 mara 13 uru Taypi sata phaxsin yuritayna - Senlis, 1991 mara 9 uru Awti phaxsin yuriwi) huk jacha marka yäpari & q'uchu arsuyaña.
Yuqanaka: .

Ch'iwa:
Ch'iwax juyra jupha achun llaqanakapawa.
Uñtapa.
Ch'iwax näs ispinakar uñtatawa. Ch'iwax nayrapachanakatpach manq'atapunitaynawa. Juphan wawa llaqa laphinakapawa.
Phayasiñataki.
Janiw achach laphinakañapakiti, jan ukasti kunawsatix chhuyuki, ukhaw wali sumaxa, ukarakiw ch'iwa sutinixa.
Ch'amañchirinaka.
Ch'iwax walja "nutrientes" ukanakaniwa, juk'ampis f"osforo, hiero" juk'ampinakaniwa.

Qanqata:
Qanqata, jan ukax qanqana, qanqani, wiwjata ukax mä quta jamach'iwa, "(Zool. mf. Cientifico suti: lophonetta especularioides alticola, tama: anatidae)".
Janchipa.
Tantiy jamach'iwa, phuyunakapax mayj qaqaratawa, ukatwa qanqata (qaqsuta) sutini. 
Manq'apa.
Jisk'a laq'unakaw manq'anakapaxa.
Qamäwipa.
Tutur manqhanakan jan ukax pata pampanakan qamasipxi.
K'awnapa.
Qachu qanqatax jallupachax 12 k'awn k'awnantañ yatitayna. Ukhamarak uka k'awnanakarux phuyumpirakiw imantiritayna.
Yatiyäwipa.
Kunawsatix mayni jaqix k'awnanakap katjixa, ukax wakanakax utjaskaniw sañ muni.

Qañuqiya:
Qañuqiya, jan ukast qiñu qiya, qiñu qiñux mä quta jamach'iwa, "(Zool. mf. tama: podicipedidae)."
Janchipa.
Mä pä chhiyanakaw jilapxi, chikat p'iqimp chikat kunkampix janq'uwa. Phuyunakapasti qaqawa. Chhuruñax jach'a ukhamarus arirakiwa.
Manq'apa.
Uma manqhan utjir jisk'a laq'unak manq'asixi. Yaqhippachanakax phuyu juq'uchxatanaks manq'apxakirakiwa. 
Qamäwipa.
Aka jamach'inakax qutar umar wali jichuntatapxiwa. Kunawsatix wal jachapxixa, anarañatakiw jachapxi. Tutur manqhan uma manqhanpun jilpach qamasipxi.
Tapapa.
Qachump urqumpix purappachaw tapapx tapachasiñ yatipxi, ukhamarak panpachanipuniw wawanaks uywarapxi. 

Waychu:
Waychu jan ukax qaqa waychux mä pata qullunak pampan jakasir jamach'iwa, (Zool. mf. Cientifico suti: black.billed Shrike, tama: agriornis montana).
Janchipa.
Phuyunakapax janq'u ch'umphiwa. Ch'iyar chhuruñapax jach'awa. 
Qamäwipa.
Waychux qullu warankh manqhanakan jakapxi, juk'ampis kawkintix umillk'awjaki, ukawjanakanpun juk'ampis utjnuqasipxixa.
Manq'apa.
Jisk'a pampa laq'unak thaqhasipxi, achu jathanakx manq'apxakirakiwa, yaqhippachanakax jararankhunaks katusipxarakiwa.
Tapapa.
Jaruchir uñtataw tapapaxa, jisk'a lawanakat pajanaka, ukhamarak tapa manqharux ch'ankhanakrak jant'ukrantasipxi. 
K'awnapa.
Qachu waychux paya jan ukax kimsa k'awn k'awnantañ yatitayna. K'awnapax q'illumpit janq'umpitawa. Ukhamarak jan jaqin makhatañawjanakaruw k'awnapxi.
Yatiyäwipa.
Kunawsatix aka jamach'ix utarus jan ukax uta pirqa patanakans khuyusk ukhax mayniw utan jiwan sañ muni. Ukhamarak kunawsatix waychux uta qhipax nayrax muysux ukax uka utan jakirinakaw sarxan sañ muni. Ukatx kunawsatix satapachanx uñtank ukhax suma maraniw satawa.

Qaqinkura:
Qaqinkura jan ukasti qaqikura, thaqinkura, qaqinjurax mä suni pata pampan jakasir jamach'iwa, "(Zool. mf. Cientifico suti: theresticus melanosis, tama: threskiornithidae)."
Janchipa.
Tantiy jamach'iwa, chhuruñapax k'umuwa, ukhamarus jach'arakiwa.
Qamäwipa.
Juk'ampis jant'awjanakan qamasipxi, quta thiyanakana, yaqhippachanakax yapu yapuchatanakarus sarapxarakiwa. Juk'ampis llamay phaxsit ch'uñuchañ phaxskamaw uñstanipxi.
Manq'apa.
Jisk'a laq'unak manq'añatakix thaqhasipxi. 
Yatiyäwipa.
Jaqinx jan wali jamach'ir uñjatawa, kunalaykutix lap'a q'ipiw uywanakatakix sasaw sañ yatipxi.

Qayti:
Qayti jan ukax qayti qayti, quta anux quta jamach'iwa, (Zool. mf. Cientifico suti: tama: Charadriidae). Anjamaw wal wajasiñ yatipxi, "qay... qay...qayti" sasaw wajasipxi ukat qayti sutini, ukhamarak yaqhipanakax quta anu sutimpiw uñt'apxaraki.
Janchipa.
Nayrapax chikawjan jisk'a wila muruq'uniwa, chhuruñapax ch'iyarawa, ukhamarak sayt'urux jach'a juch'usawa, kayitupanakax laramawa, p'iqimp purakawjampix janq'urakiwa, jikhanipasti ch'iyararakiwa. 
Qamäwipa.
Qaytix juk'ampis panipuniw qamasi, yaqhippachanakas jisk'a tamanakans jalnaqapxarakiwa. Juk'ampis quta thiyanakana, jawir lakanakan qamasipxi. 
Manq'apa.
Manq'asiñatakix uma manqhat thaqhasipxi, pata patawjanakan juk'ampis chhuruñamp alintasinx thaqhapxi. 
Tapapa.
Qaytix jisk'a lawanakampit llapanakampit lurasipxi, juk'ampis quta thiyanakaruw tapachapxi.
K'awnapa.
Qaytix pusi k'awn k'awnapxi, uka k'awnapax niyas ch'uxñawa, jisk'a ch'iyar ch'ixinakaniwa.
Yatiyäwipa.
Kunawsatix qaytix qay...qay...qayti sasax jachapxixa, ukax thaytaniniw sañ muni.

Q'illu jamach'i:
Q'illu jamach'i, jan ukax q'illunchu, q'illinchitu, khunu jamach'i, q'illuñchux mä jisk'a suni jamach'iwa, "(Zool. mf. Cientifico suti: Bright-rumped yellow-finch, tama: Sicalis uropygialis)." 
Janchipa.
Mä wiku ukch'a jisk'a jamach'iwa. Phuyunakapax q'illuwa, ukat qaqaw yaqhipawjanakaxa. Urqurix khiruniwa, ukat amuyañawa. 
Qamäwipa.
Aka jamach'inakax tamanpun aywinaqapxi, juk'ampis pampanakana, qullu k'uch'unakana, utawjanakans sarnaqapxarakiwa. 
Manq'apa.
Juk'ampis jisk'a achunakampiw (juyra jupha, illama, qañawa, juk'ampinaka) jakasipxi, yaqhippachanakax jisk'a laq'unaks manq'asipxarakiwa. 
Tapapa.
Tapapx jaruchir uñtat lurasipxi, juk'ampis warank manqhanakaruw tapaxhapxi, pastunaka, t'arwanakat tapapx wakt'ayasipxi.
K'awnapa.
Pusi janq'u k'awnanak k'awnapxi, ukhamarux turpa ch'umphi ch'ixinakaniwa.
Yatiyäwipa.
Juk'ampis aka jamach'ix khunu jamach'it uñt'atapxiwa. Kunawsatix ch'iw ch'iw ch'iw sas jachapxix, ukax khununiw sañ muni. 

Sillinq'u:
Sillinq'u jan ukax k'illichu, sillillanka, kulunrinax mä jisk'a jamach'iwa, "(Zool. mf. Cientifico suti: Hirundo rustica; Petrochelidon andecola, tama: Hirundinidae)." 
Janchipa.
Jisk'a mä wiku ukch'a jamach'iwa. Juk'ampis chhiqhapax jach'itanakawa, ukaw yaqha jamach'inakatx mayjt'ayi, p'iqiwjamp jikhanimpiw ch'iyaritawa, purakawjasti janq'urakiwa, jisk'a chhuruñanikiwa. Jank'akipuniw jalnaqt'añ yatipxi, juk'ampis uma quta patxanakanx walpun jalanaqt'apxi. 
Qamäwipa.
Sarir jutir jamach'inakawa, alaska markatpach purinipxi. Juk'ampis jallupachaw suni Titiqaqa quta irananakanx qarqa taypinakan mirantapxi, qamantapxi. 
Manq'apa.
Juk'ampis chhichhillankhanak manq'apxi.
Tapapa.
Warankh mankhanakaruw tapachañ yatipxi.
K'awnapa.
K'awnapax janq'itunakawa.
Yatiyäwipa.
Kunawsatix wal jalanaqapjixa, ukhax jalluw jalluntan sañ muni. Ukat ukhamatix mä payitak mayak jalanaqapjixa, ukax janiw jallkanit sañrak muni. 

Awyayala:
Awyayala jan ukax Awyiyalax jach'a uraqiwa , aka uraqix Alaska markatpach Tierra de fuego uraqkamawa.
Tawantinsuyu.
Tawantinsuyux aka jach'a uraq taypinkiwa. Inkapachanx pusi suyur jaljatataynawa: Qullasuyu, Antisuyu, Qhuntisuyu, Chinchasuyu.

Saräwinaka:
Saräwinakax täqi jaqinakan sarnaqäwinakapawa, jakawinakapawa ukhamarak qamäwinapakapawa. 
Maya: isthapisiñ sarawi: aka sarawinxa parli kunjams nayra pachana waynanak, tawaqunak isthapisina ukatuqita.
Paya: manq‘anak sarawi: akan uñjañani kunjams nayra pachanxa manq‘asiphana ukata kunjams jichha urux manq‘asiptan ukatuqita yatxatañani.
Kimsa: piq‘inchirinak sarawi: akanxa parlañani kunjams piq‘inchiripa wali suma irnaqana.
Jichha urux piq‘inchirix janiw askikiti, qullqinak lunthatasi`pxi ukanak uñtañani.
Pusi: thuqhuñ saräwi: aka sarawinxa parli kunjams nayra pachanxa thuqhupxana, Jichha uruxkunjams thuqhupxtan.
Ukhamanak parlañani.
Kunkañchäwi.
Aka t‘aqanxa uñjañani urunakata ukatxa sarawinakata, kunjams narra pachanxa jakapxana, jichha urux kunjams jakapxatan. Akan parlañani junat wayna tawaqu asxarapxi aymar aru parlaña, akan siw: jichha uruxa jiwasanakax janiw aymar aru parlañ munaptanti, sarawinakax jichha urux chhaxtañ muni.
Jichhapachamp nayrapachampi.
Jichha uruxa wayna tawaqunakax janiw munapxiti punchunaka, wiskhunaka, uwij pulliranaka, phullunaka ukhamaraki ch‘utuqunakampi isthapisiña.
Jupanakax siwa: uka isinakax pasxiw, jichha urux suma isinakax utji pallqanaka wali kusa, allmillanakax samipax jiwakiwa, jichha urux wiskhux janiw sinti utjiti, manqhanchanakax suma ch‘uqutawa walja saminakampi utji.
Maranakax jani walikiti, jichha urux jiwasanakax janiw manq‘apxtan chayrunaka, p‘isqinaka, q‘allu muntarunaka, ch‘uñunaka, k‘ispiñanaka, apillanaka, ukhamaraki ulluku manq‘anaka.
Jichha urux wayna tawaqu manq‘i saxtanaka, t‘impunaka, arusanaka, firiyunaka, pullunaka manq‘apxi.
Uka manq‘anakax jani walikiti, jichha wayna tawaqunakax mirintasiñ yatipxiti jupanakax sapakiw manq‘apxi, janiw masinakampi manq‘apxi.
Aru.
Ni aymar aru parlañ munapxiti, jupanakax siwa: nanakax janiw aymar aru parlañ muntan masinakax larch‘ukitaspawa siw.
Sarnaqäwi.
Nayra urunxa p‘iqinchirix tata mallku, mama t‘allampi jupanakax irnaqana, janiw lunthatasirikanti wali suma irnaqapxana. Fiestanakapax jiwakiwa utjana tarkiada, waka waka, musiñana, pinkillada, ukhamaraki chunchu thuqhupxana.
Jichha urux p‘iqinchirinakax wali lunthatanakawa, jupanakakiw kunanaka munapxi. Ukat wayna tawaqunakax janiw amuyasipxiti.
Ukat wayna tawaqunakax thuqhuñapax regueton, villera, tecno, cumbia thuqhupxi larusiñjama.
Nayra pachanxa janiw qullqi utkanti achachilanakax lurapxana “trueque” ch‘uñunakampi, tuntanakampi, ch‘uqinakampi, apillanakampi, ullukunakampi truequepxana muxsa achunakampi puquta, laranja ukhamaraki mandarina ukanak lurapxana.
Suma qamaña.
Nayra pachanxa suma qamasiña utjana ni lunthatas, ni jayranakas, ni k‘arisirisix suma sarawinaka utjana.
Jichha urux walja lunthatanakax utji, qullqichasawipax aljapxi jacha utaru, uka jacha utax sutipax “empresa” satawa ukaru achunaka aljapxi, uka empresa q‘añuchi pachamamaru, umanaka q‘añuchapxi uka quimikunakampi ukat nanakax janiw amuyasipxtanti uka quimikunakax pachamamaru jiwayaskiwa.
Tukuya.
Ukhamax tukuyirista sasina waynanaka tawaqunaka janiw armasisna aka sarawinakata jumanakax uñjasipxtawa aka pachamamaxa wali usuchatawa ukat janiw jallkiti ukat achunakax jani sum jillkiti uka janiw askikiti.
Ukaru sirista nanakax sinti jayranka yatiqtan, nanakax janiw qamir jaqipxtanti, jiwasax sum sarnaqasiñaspawa jan lunthatasiñampi, ukat sirista aymar arusa sumaya

Allpaqa:
Allpaqa, jan ukax paqu, allpachux mä anti uraqin jakir jach'a uywawa.
Allpachu kastanaka.
Utxiwa pä kasta allpachunaka 
Huacaya.
Uka kasta allpachusti janiwa ancha tarwanikiti.
Jisk’a tarwanikiwa.
Suri.
Aka kasta allpachusti jacha tarwaniwa.
T'arwapa.
Uka tarwanakata lurasiispawa akanaka
T'arwapax wali quña t'arwawa. T'arwapatx taqikast isinakapuniw lurasispa: chumpanaka, phullunaka, punchunaka, allmiñanaka, wantisanaka, awayunaka, juk'ampinakaw lurasispana.
Qamäwipa.
Allpachunakasti jakapxiwa pampanakana.
Janchipa.
Allpachusti pusi kayuni uywawa. Wichhinkhapaxa jisk'akiwa, jinchupaxa jisk'akiwa. Niyas qarwar uñtatawa, kunamayawa qarwata juk'ampi t'arwaniwaSuni patana jakiri uywawa.
Manq'apa.
Taqikasta pastunaka  manq'apxi.
Wichhunaka,t’ulanaka,j’uqh’unaka jukampinakampi.
Allpachunakaxa j’ukhunakana jaq’asipxi
Mirañapata.
Urq’u allpachusti  qachu allpachuru katu ukhama mirantapxi.
Aka allpachunakasti jallu pacha jilpacha katusipxi.
Wallq'iptañapata.
Allpachunakasti  Kimsa pataka suxta tunka urunaka wallqi sarnakapxi.
Aka allpachunakana utjaspawa taqi kasta laqunaka.
Utjaspawa usunaka,laqunaka,juk'ampinaka.
Sarna,Lapa,Garrapata jamaku yakh’ampinaka-
Usu  tuqitsti utjarakiwa akanaka.
Bronquitis verminosa
Distomatosis hepática
Hidatidosis
Sarcocistiosis
Coccidiosis
Teniasis
. Sarcocisticercosis
Uka usunakasti janiwa aski miraykiti allpachunakaru.
Suma apnak’añataqisti qullañawa taq’i kasta laq’unakata.
Ukhamaraki q’ullarakiwa usunakata,
Uka lurasasti allpachunakasti suma chamantapxani,
Ukhamaraki utjaniwa walja allpachu qallunaka..

Lumasa:
Lumasax pacha sarayir uywa, jamach'i, jan ukax aliwa. Nayra pachatpach awich achachilanakax lumasanakarjamaw sarayasipxiritayna.
Uywa lumasa.
Qamaqi.
Mä qhananchir pachamaman uywapawa.
Aka qhananchirinakax nayrj pach achachilinakan amuyupawa kunjamatix jichha pachaprakiw lurasipki nayrj pachata. Jupanakan amtawinakapax sayt`ayanatak jan kuna pasañapataki kunjamatix jallus utji, lupi, juyphi, junk`ampi nakat ukhamarak satañ uksatuqinakaya UÑT`AYAWI: Qamaqix wali uñt`atawa markachirinakata patatuqin uksanakana aka uywax uñt`ayna pachamam uksa tuqita kunjamatix waxasiwip ist`asin yatxapxanawa kunas jutan uka .nayraqat phaxsin yapu lurawin uñch`ukipxwa qhanañchawi phaxsi ch`uqi satawi. Taqikunat sapa markan utki ukanakax qhanañchapxiwa taqikunat paskasp uksa tuqita, qamaqix ukhamarak uwij aychanak manq`iriwa.
Jamapax janq`uki ukhax qhanañchiwa pachamamax sumakiskarakiwa ukhamarak yapu lurawinakax sumakiskaniwa ukhamarak ch`uñu chawisa. Uqini ukhax qhanañcharakiwa janiw ancha sumakaniti jach`a pach ukharak jisk`a pacha Utjani ch`akanak ukax qhanañchiwa walja jisk`a uywanak uka taqi kast uywanakata. Jikjatasini puch ch`uñuta ukamarak jupha, siwara,ch`uq ukanakax qhanañchapxarakiwa pachax askikiniwa taqi kast yapuchawi nakataki. Sinti siwar sapax jikjatasini ukhax siwarax qhanañchakiwa uka maran siwaraki sum achurakispa.
Qamaqin awullitapa.
Kunapachatix qamaqin awullawip ist`apki ukhax uñt`apxiwa kunayman kast amuyukwinaka jichhax unt`añaniwa akanaka. -Kuna pachatix qamaqix wali qhana waxasi jan jaychjasisa ukhax qhanañchstuwa pachamama wali kiskaniwa jallu pachana thayapachana ukhamarak suma achuqawinaka. -Kunapachatix qamaqix jaychjas ukhax qhanañcharakiwa m ajan suma mara juk`a jallumpiki wali thaya ukhamarak juyranakax janiw sum achupaskati.
Qalltat yupaychawit uka qhanañchirinkax jupanakakiw patapampan yatiyapxi ukhamat patapampanakan jupanakax amuyasipxana janiw qamaqipun yatiskapati pachatuqita waya uywanakaw yatiyir utjapxaraki .kunjamatix liq` liq` ukax uñtasakiw sarnaqapxana pachamama uksatuqina.sarnaqapxana. Ukhamarakiw jichha pachan janiw yaqhapxiti qhanañchir uywanakaru.

Miji:
Miji, jan ukax quta khuchix mä quta jamach'iwa, "(Zool. mf. Cientifico suti: Phalacrocorax brasilianus, tama: Phalacrocoracidae)." 
Janchipa.
Taytiy jamach'iwa, kunkapax jach'awa, chhuruñapx alayarupuniw qhiwti. Phuyunakapax ch'iyart'atawa. 
Qamäwipa.
Aka jamach'ix kawknir umawjans qamakispawa: jayuk'arawjans jan jayuk'arawjansa.
Manq'apa.
Challwanakaw manq'apaxa. 
Qullatapa.
Chichipas wilapas p'iqimuy usutakix wali askiw sasaw markachirinakax uñt'apxi.

Leoncio Prado:
Liyunsu Prayu Qutirris ("Leoncio Prado Gutiérrez", Kastilla aru), sutil (* Wanuku, 1853 mara 25 uru Thaya phaxsin yuritayna - † Wamachuku, 1883 15 uru Huillka kuti phaxsin yuriwi, Piruwpi), jacha marka militar.
Awki: Maryanu Inasyu Prayu (Mariano Ignacio Prado); Tayka: Mariya Awilina Qutirris Kurtís (María Avelina Gutiérrez Cortés).

Mimula:
Mimulax mä thuqhu phust'awiwa. 
Thuqhurinaka.
Mimulax Titiqaqa quta irananakan thuqhusi. Thuqhurinakapax janq'u pulliraniw thuqhupxi. P'iqipatxanx parin phuyunakan k'achachsutawa. 
Mimul siku.
Mimul sikux wankaranakamp lakitanakampiw thuqhus phust'asi. Mimulax sikut luratawa, 22 p'iyaniwa, 
Sanka.
Jach'a mimul sikuwa.
Maltapoto.
Tantiy mimul sikuwa.
Ch'uli.
Jisk'a mimul sikuwa.

Bartolomé de Las Casas:
Bartolomé de Las Casas suti Sevilla, 1484 mara yuritayna - Madrid, 1566 mara 31 uru Huillka kuti yuriwi) jacha marka Duminikanu munqhim chiqa yachaq taytakura. 
Chiapas Hatun yaya (19.12.1543 – 11.9.1550).
Qillqanaka.
Ispañapiqa chay qillqankunata liwruchayta chunka pusaqniyuq pachakwatakama manas saqillarqankuchu.
Paypa sutinpi.
Qusqupi rurayasqa «Centro de Estudios Regionales Andinos» ("Anti Suyup Yachay Suntur"). Maskhayananpaq, yuyayananpaq, chaniyananpaq, wisñiyananpaq Anti yachay tarpuyta.

José Matías Manzanilla:
José Matías Manzanilla Barrientos (Ika marka, 1867 mara 5 uru Taypi sata phaxsin yuritayna - Lima marka, 1947 mara 6 uru Taypi sata phaxsin yuriwi) jacha marka arxatirisi & anakithiri.
Awki: Matías Manzanilla; Tayka: Jesús Barrientos.<br>Warmi: Victoria Rada.
Alma mater: San Markus Jach'a Yatiñ Uta.
Rektur San Markus Jach'a Yatiñ Uta (1923-1928 & 1930),
1932-1933 Piruw Uma kamayuq.

Lao Tzu:
Lao Tzu (chinu arupi 老子, pinyin: lǎozǐ, kastilla arupi: Lao Tsé, "Machu Yachaq ") suti huk China Lup'intawiri, ru llup'ina nisqa Yupaychäwipa kamaqninsi.
Asu Ku (苦縣 Kǔ Xiàn) marka, Chǔ suyupi (楚).

Italak Marka:
Italak Markax mä aymar markawa.
Jaqipa.
Italaki markanja Walja Jaqinaka junthapipxi Mä jach’a utaru ukata wali aruskipapxi. Mä yatiqaña utata ukata chachanakax. Wali munapxi mä yatiña utata. Ukata warminakaxa wali apuyapxi utjañapataki ukata wali aruskipapxi suma qiltiri suma Amuytiri nayrir irptiri Italaki Markasarú.
Yapuchaña.
Italaki markanja waly llakisiñakawa utji janiw juyrax utjkiti.
Qullqichasiña.
Jupanakaxa turki apnaqapxana. Ukata qullqimpixa jutampxana Escoma Markarú Ukata alasispxanwa muqsa achunaka ukata sarxapxarakinwa. ukata thakin jikisipxana ma tatampi ukhamarakiwa ma mamampiw jikisipxana. Mama yatichirixa sarakinwa taqi mayni pankanaka ullart`añani y qillt´añani italaki markana

Julio César Tello:
Julio César Tello Rojas suti (* Waruchiri 1880 mara 11 uru Yapu apthapi phaxsin yuritayna - † [[7 ñiqin inti raymi wañusqa Lima, 1947 mara 7 uru Juyphi phaxsin yuriwi) jacha marka arkhiyulugu, midiku & anakithiri.
San Markus Jach'a Yatiñ Utapim Yachachijg Yatichiri hunt'arqan.

José Martí:
José Julián Martí Pérez suti (* La Habana, 1853 mara 28 uru Chichu phaxsin yuritayna - Dos Ríos, 1895 mara 19 uru Llamayu phaxsin yuriwi), jacha marka anakithiri, Lup'intawiri & qillqiri.
Awki: Mariano Martí y Navarro, (Valencia llaqtapi); Tayka: Leonor Pérez Cabrera, (Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Islas Canarias llaqtapi).<br>Warmi: Carmen Zayas-Bazán<br>Yuqanaka: José Francisco Martí y Zayas-Bazán, "El Ismaelillo" 
Yatiña uta: Colegio de San Anacleto wan Colegio de San Pablo

Nicolás Guillén:
Nicolás Guillén suti (Camagüey, 1902 mara 10 uru Huillka kuti phaxsin yuritayna - La Habana, 1989 mara 17 uru Huillka kuti phaxsin yuriwi) jacha marka qillqiri.

Los Andes Provincia:
Los Andes Provincia, La Paz Departamento uksanw jikxatasi. Alayarux Larecaja ukat Omasuyos, inti jalantarux Titiqaqa qutampi, aynacharux Ingavi, inti jalsurux Murillo provinciampirakiw qurpasi. Uksanx waka uywaw jilpachax uywata, lichiria ukham uñt’atarakiw lichitx kisu atipxi ukax Chukiyaw jach’a markaruw aljañatak apapxi maysatx PIL ANDINA uksaruw lichi aljapxi.
"Markachirinak"a.
INE 2012 uka jakthapiwirjamax 78.579 markachiriw utji.
Municipionaka.
Provincia de Los Andes uksanx pusi municipio ukhar t’aqxatawa: Nayrïr municipio Pucarani, payïri Laja, kimsïri Batallas, pusiristi Puerto Pérez jall ukhamat t’aqanuqt’atawa. 
Markanakapa.
12 markanakaw (cantones) utji.
Los Andes Provincian capitalapax Pucarani markawa.

Clark Gable:
William Clark Gable suti, Clark Gable (* Cadiz, 1901 mara 1 uru Anata phaxsin yuritayna - † Los Angeles, 1960 mara 16 uru Awti phaxsin yuriwi) jacha marka cinepi yäpari 
Oskar Pallay 1934.
Warminaka: Josephine Dillon (1924-1930), Maria "Ria" Franklin Printiss Lucas Langham (1931-1939), Carole Lombard (1939-1942), Sylvia Ashley (1949-1952), Kay Williams (1955-1960).

Cohana marka:
Cohana markaxa, Provincia Los Andes, municipio Pukarani, La Paz, Bolivia, Titikaka quta thiyan jikxatasi. Chukiyaw markatx 80 tupu sarañanw jikxatasi.
Jaqinakapa.
Niya 3.000 jila jaqinakaw utji.
Markanakamp qurpasiwipa.
Inti jalsurux Wila Jawira ayllumpi, inti jalantarux Velen Yayes ayllumpi, alayarux Cumana ayllumpi, aynacharux Ch’uxasivi , Lacaya ayllumpirakiw qurpasi.
Qullqichäwi.
 Jilpach markachirix waka uywampiw saranaqasipxi, sapürunjamaw Chukiyaw markarux niya 2.000 kisu aljañatak apapxi ukatx sapa sawarurakiw Batalla jach’a qhathur wakanak aljir apapxi, uksatuqitw qullq jikxatapxi; maysatx ch’uqi, jawasa, jupha juyranak aljasisax qullqinipxarakiw juk’ampis kisu, lichi uksatpunw jilpachx qullqx apt’asipxi. Chhalaqa, Cohana markanx sapa juywis urunakaw qhathux apasi, ukarux Isla Pariti, Quehuaya uksa markanakatx challw ch’uñump ch’uqimp juphamp chhalaqasiñatak apanipxi, junt’u markatx muxsa achunakx juyranakamp alaqasiñatakix apapxarakiwa.
Mark irpxarüwi.
 Cohana markanx Sindical tamaw utji, Secretario General, Relaciones, Justicia jall ukanakaw utji, ukampirus jach’a irpirix Agente Cantonal, Corregidor Territorial, Junta Vecinal ukanakawa. Sub Alcaldía de Municipio Pucarani ukax Uksanakarakiwa.
Utanakapa.
Jach’a plasapxanx kimsa, pusi pisun jach’autanakaw utji, ukasti ladrillo, kalamina yänakamp utacht’atawa. Uksa chiqanx mä urbanización ukar tukuyatxarakiwa. Maysatx thiyairamanakanx mä qawqha ñiqit lurat jichhump tuturam utachxatat utanakax uñjasiskarakiwa.
Sawuta, p'itata.
Uksa markanx kullanakax ikiña, awayu, wayitilla, phullu sawt’añ yatipxi, maystax tawaqunakax janiw punch sawupkiti jan ukasti chuyman kullakanakaw punch sawupxi, jilanakax lluch’u, ch’uspa p’itañ sawuñ yatipxi; taqi uka sawut p’itatanakax kunayman samincht’ata ukhamarak markanakan yänakapamp chimpunt’atawa.
Uksa markanx mayni kullakatï uksankirimp jan ukax pachpankir jilamp jaqichasiñ munch ukhax 12 away sawt’atanïñapawa kipka amparapamp lurt’atañapuniwa, ukaw jaqichasiñapatakix iyawsata jan ukhamakch ukhax janiw iyawsatakarakïti. Aka siglo XXI ukanx janikiw anch mayitaxiti, ukampis jïlir awich achilanakax tawaqunakarux tumpt’asipkakiw kunalaykutï ukaw uksa markan saräwipaxa.
Uywachäwi.
Waka, iwija, khuchhi, wallpa, uywanakw uywasipxi.
Yapuchäwi.
Ch’uqi, jupha, jawasa achuyapxaraki.
Phunchhäwi.
Cohana markanx kipka phunchhäwinakapa ukhamarak patrunanakan uñstayat phunchhäwinakaw utji.
Jach’a phunchhäwipax 15 uru lakan phaxsit saraqkipanw “Virgen de Asunta” ukar sapa maranjam amtasipxi, uksanx jilpachax qhaqhirw thuqhut’asiñ yatipxi, ukampirus phunchhäwin jila kullakanakax wali kust’at bandanak purintayañ yatipxi.
15 uru llamayu phaxsit saraqatarux “ Tata San Isidro” ukarurakiw amt’asipxi, ukanx Qinaqina, Wakawaka thuqt’asipxi. 
3 uru llamayu phaxsit saraqkipanx phunchhäwix kipkarakiw utji, ukanx Qarwani thuqt’asipxaraki. 
24 uru jallu qallta phaxsit saraqkipanx Aguinaldo phunchhäwix utjarakiw ukanx Niñula sutin thuqhuw thuqhupxaraki.
Yupaychäwi.
Cohana markanx religión católica ukatx religión cristiana ukaw utji, católica uksanx mä Iglesiaw utji Virgencita de Asunta ukaw ukankaraki. Religion Cristiana uksanx “Los Amigos”, “Pentecostes” uka tamanakaw utjaraki.

Anthony Quinn:
Antonio Rodolfo Quinn Oaxaca suti Anthony Quinn (* Chihuahua, 1915 mara 2 uru Yapu apthapi phaxsin yuritayna - Boston, 2001 mara 3 uru Juyphi phaxsin yuriwi) - jacha marka yäpari.
Oskar Pallay.
Awki: Francisco Quinn ; Tayka: Manuela Oaxaca<br>Warminaka: Katherine DeMille (1937-1965) / Jolanda Addolori (1966-1997) / Katherine Benvin (1997-2001)<br>Yuqanaka (12): Christofer ( 1939 - 1941), Christina (1941), Catalina (1942), Duncan (1945), Valentina (1952), Francesco (1963 - 2011), Danny (1964), Lorenzo (1966), Sean Quinn (1973), Alexandre Anthony Quinn (1976), Antonia (1993) & Ryan Nicholas (1996).

Q'uwa:
Q’uwax mä thujsa qurawa, janirakiw sinti axtasiñjam thujsakarakisa, ukat pata pampanakan, sirka parkinakan, qala taypinakan utjaspa. Ukampirus yakhip chikt’anakanx janiw q’uwax utjkarakispati kunalaykutix uraqitjamawa.
¿Kunjamas q’uwaxa?
Q’uwax mä ch’uxña qurawa, mä luqa ukch’anakaw yakhippachax jilaraki ukampirus q’uwa lawas chupika ukat llaqanakapax jisk’a ch’uxñitanakawa.
¿Kunatakis askipacha?
Q’uwax aknirinakatakiw apnaqata:  
·        Purak usutaki:.
Kunapachatix maynix purak usumpiki ukhax janq’akiw q’uwa mathi umantixa, kunalaykutix q’uwax junt’u qurachixaya ukat jank’akiw purak usu apaqaspa. 
·        Ch’akha t’ijitaki:.
Uka pachparakikiw ch’akha t’ijitaki, kuna ch’akha t’ukunakatakis askipuniw q’uwa wallaqit umaph jarsusisin phututsuyasiñäxa.
·        Wallaqi phayasiñataki:.
Nämakis wallaqitakix wali askipuniwa, jan q’uwampix janiw wallaqjamakaspati. Wallaqix mä manq'awa, juk'ampis khaysa quta thiyanakan phayasitawa. Wallaqix challwa wallaqiyatawa, siwullampi, ch'uqimpi, wayk'ampi ukham phayatawa. Q'uwax janïr challwamp jarintkasin wallaqt'ayañawa, ch'uxña q'uwax wali sumapuniwa.
·        Uywan jan purak ch’itiyasiñapataki:.
Pata pampanakanx alwa tuqirux wali khuphantataw ch’uxña  uywa manq’anakaxa, ukat kunapachatix uywanakax ukhampach maq’thapi ukhax purak ch’itt’ayasispa ukat  jan ch’itt’ayasiñapatakix q’uwaw nayraqat manqantayaña, walja q’uwaw uywa manq’añarux marqantaña, Jilpachax wakampir iwijampiru manq’ayaña. 
·        Phayasiñataki:.
Qhirit manq’a phayasiñatakix waña q’uwa lawanakax askipuniwa.

Qillwa:
Qillwa.
Kunanaks manq’asi.
Kunanakay manq’añjamachi ukanak qillwax manq’asipxi. Quta iramanakanx kunayman quta uywanak, quranak, jisk’a jamch’inak, urpilanak, jamach’ k’awnanak, chiwchinak, achakunak manq’asipxi. uka uymwanax chhurupampiw jiwjayapxi.
Kawkhans jakasipxi.
Jupanakax lamar quta, qutanaka, jisk’a quta thiyanakanwa jakasipxi ukatx wali jayanak tuyupxi. Jupanakax challwa katur warkunakaruw arkanaqapxi manq’a thakasisina ukax wali uñjañapuniwa. Ukampirus jawir thiyanakans jakasipxararakikiwa.
Sarnaqawipa.
Aka jamach’inakax wali chikhinakawa, jupanakpachax yatiykipasipxarakikiwa. Larus argentatus jupanakax wali jan uñjañ sarnaqawinak uñicht’ayasipxi.
Kuna kastanakas utji.
Kastanakax mawk’it chamakiwa ajllsuñaxa ukampirus waljanakapuniw utji.

Adam Smith suti (Kirkcaldy, 1723 mara 5 uru Juyphi phaxsin yuritayna - Edinburgh, 1790 mara 6 uru Huillka kuti phaxsin yuriwi), Iskusiya jacha marka ikunumista.

Alma mater: Glasgow Jach'a Yatiñ Uta. 

Tayka Teresa:
Tayka Teresa (kastilla aru: Santa Teresa de Calcuta, Agnes Gonxha Bojaxhiu, ) (* Uskuv, 1910 mara 26 uru Thaya phaxsin yuritayna - † Kolkata, 1997 mara 5 uru Llamp'u phaxsin yuriwi), Alwaña jach'a marka kathuliku santu.

Robin Williams:
Robin McLaurin Williams (* Chicago, 1951 mara 21 uru Huillk kuti apthapi phaxsin yuritayna – Paradise Cay, 2014 mara 11 uru Thaya phaxsin yuriwi), jacha marka yäpa jaqiq.

Erwin Schrödinger:
Erwin Rudolf Josef Alexander Schrödinger suti (Erdberg, 1887 mara 12 uru Thaya phaxsin yuritayna - Wien, 1961 mara 4 uru Chichu phaxsin yuriwi) huk Austriya jacha marka pachaykamay yatxatawiri.

Francis Bacon:

Paul Dirac:

Werner Heisenberg:

Mink'a:
Mink'ax jan ukasti Minga sutimp uñt'atawa. Mink'ax Qullasuyun Tawantinsuyun irnaqäwinakan purapat yanapt'asiñ irnaqäwinakawa.

Abu Dhabi Marka:
Abu Dhabi (US /ˈɑːbuː ˈdɑːbi/, UK /ˈæbuː ˈdɑːbi/; Arabic "Abū Ẓabī" ) uka markax kapitalawa ukhamarak United Arab Emirates markanak taypinx payïr jach'a markawa (nayrïr jach'a markax Dubai uka sutiniwa). Abu Dhabi markax Golfo Pérsico ukawjar watt'xattatawa. Aka markax 1.5 waranqhan waranqhap (milluna) jaqinitaynaw khaya 2014 marakamaxa.
Abu Dhabi ukankiw  United Arab Emirates kuwirnuxa. Ukhamarak aka jach'a markankiw kunayman aljasiñanak alasiñanak mayacht'atanakaxa. Wali jank'akipunirakiw aka markax utt'asitapatpachax jiltaniwayatayna.
Kunjamats sutipax juti.
"Dhabi" ukax qillwa/ qiwlla uka jamach'in sutipatanawa. Ukat ukham sutinitan aka markaxa. Uka quta lakanakanx walja tam tam qillwanakapuniw qutunaqtapxiritayna.
Nayrapachatpach jichhürkama.
Abu Dhabi uka uraqiwjanx walja kunayman nayrapach markanakaw uñstatayna, mä nayra jaqinakax Umm an-Nar Culture ukataynawa.

Ach.:
ach. saphi.raiz. Saphi, qallta aruwa, walja amuyu, walja kasta amuyuw aka sapitx saraqtarakispa.

Qullan uta:
qullan uta. s. top.Tatitump aruskipañ uta,tatitur mayisiñ uta.kimsaqallq waranq mara saraqatanxa jaqinakax mayachaqan Tatituw mayaxhaqan utt'ayasa mayipxitayna.
qulla = kimsa kasta qullanakaw utjaeaki 1) mayirixa: castilla arun hospital. qullañ uta, ukax usut jaqinakaw wal sarantapxi. mayaxa qullañ, mayasti qullan, jisa ,janiw pachpakiti.
n= waykatir phuqhanchirwa. 
jichha, yaqha qullan utasti mä utax walja qullanakas utjkaspa ukhamarakiw; ukampirusa. aruskipasktan uka qullan utax : ajayut ajay tuqi Tatitur yupaychañ uta satawa.

Escritura:
Qillqax arsutaruw uñacht'ayi, kuntix jaqix arskixa uk jisk'a rixtanakampiw aksat uksat chimpt'at qillqanakawa. Aka qillqax juk'ampis yatiñanak yatiyäwinak jaya pacha imañatakirakiwa.  

Ikiña:
[Sleep Foundation Uka mayacht'atax akhamat ikiñaw sasaw iwxt'araki: 
Jisk'a wawanaka (1-2 maraninaka): 11 jan ukasti 14 pachanaka.
Janïr iskuylankirinaka (3-5 maraninaka): 10 jan ukasti 13 pachanaka.
Iskuylankir wawanaka (6-13 maraninaka): 9 jan ukasti 11 pachanaka.Maxt'allunaka(14-17 maraninaka):  10,08 pachanaka.
waynanaka (18 a 25 maraninaka): 7 jan ukasti 9 pachanaka. 
jilïrinaka (26-64 maraninaka): entre 7 y 9 horas.
Adultos mayores (de 65 años):  7 jan ukasti 8 pachanaka.]]
Ikiñax kunawsatix janchix samarki ukhawa, ukapachanx janiw amparanakas kayunakas p'iqis inxtkiti. Nayrapachanakatpach jaqix ikipuniwa.
